AppliedForce_alarak.name: Applied Force
AppliedForce_alarak.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but Telekinesis pushes 20% further.

PowerConduit_alarak.name: Power Conduit
PowerConduit_alarak.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Lightning Surge by 10.

DoubleCross_alarak.name: Double Cross
DoubleCross_alarak.description: Increases the range of Discord Strike by 25% and also hits in a line perpendicular to the forward strike.

RecklessStrike_alarak.name: Reckless Strike
RecklessStrike_alarak.description: Reduces the delay of Discord Strike by 0.25 seconds but if it hits an enemy you become Vulnerable, causing Alarak to take 25% more damage for 2 seconds.

CycleofDiscord_alarak.name: Cycle of Discord
CycleofDiscord_alarak.description: Reduces the cooldown of Discord Strike by 2 seconds. If a Discord Strike hits no enemies, the mana cost is refunded and cooldown reduced by 3 seconds.

ChaosReigns_alarak.name: Chaos Reigns
ChaosReigns_alarak.description: ❢ Quest: Each time Discord Strike hits a Hero its damage increases by 3 up to 45.. ❢ Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 45.

EndlessEnergy_alarak.name: Endless Energy
EndlessEnergy_alarak.description: ❢ Quest: Heroes hit between you and the victim permanently decreases the cooldown of Lightning Surge by 0.2 seconds, up to 2 seconds.. ❢ Reward: None

Thunderstruck_alarak.name: Thunderstruck
Thunderstruck_alarak.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10%, but Lightning Surge slows enemies hit between you and the victim by 70% for 2 seconds.

DeadlyCharge_alarak.name: Deadly Charge
DeadlyCharge_alarak.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies in the path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.This ability will take over your Trait button.

CounterStrike_alarak.name: Counter-Strike
CounterStrike_alarak.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Channel for 1 second and become Protected. After, if an enemy Hero attacked you, send a shockwave that deals 548 (260 + 4% per level) damage.This ability will take over your Trait button.

Dissonance_alarak.name: Dissonance
Dissonance_alarak.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but increases Discord Strike's silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

Psychokinesis_alarak.name: Psychokinesis
Psychokinesis_alarak.description: Increases the damage of Telekinesis by 100%.

HinderedMotion_alarak.name: Hindered Motion
HinderedMotion_alarak.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but Telekinesis slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.

PureMalice_alarak.name: Pure Malice
PureMalice_alarak.description: Passive: When a nearby Ally Hero dies, your Sadism bonus is increased by 8%, stacking up to 40%. This bonus Sadism cannot be consumed by Hasty Bargain and is lost on death.

QuickMind_alarak.name: Quick Mind
QuickMind_alarak.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% and the cooldown of Telekinesis by 6 seconds.

ProjectedForce_alarak.name: Projected Force
ProjectedForce_alarak.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but increases the range of Telekinesis by 25%.

SustainingPower_alarak.name: Sustaining Power
SustainingPower_alarak.description: Increases the healing you receive from dealing damage to Heroes with Lightning Surge by 30%.

NegativelyCharged_alarak.name: Negatively Charged
NegativelyCharged_alarak.description: Increases damage dealt to enemies hit by the center beam of Lightning Surge by 100%, but does not generate any additional healing.

LastLaugh_alarak.name: Last Laugh
LastLaugh_alarak.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds. Activate to remove all roots, slows, and damage over time effects and teleport to the chosen location. Activating Last Laugh will immediately reduce Alarak's Health to 1.

HastyBargain_alarak.name: Hasty Bargain
HastyBargain_alarak.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds. Activate to permanently reduce your Sadism bonus by 4% and reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

CompoundingAether_chromie.name: Compounding Aether
CompoundingAether_chromie.description: ❢ Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes with Sand Blast increase its damage by 100.

DeepBreathing_chromie.name: Deep Breathing
DeepBreathing_chromie.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 2, up to 50.. ❢ Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 150 and also increase your sight radius by 100%.

TimewalkersPursuit_chromie.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
TimewalkersPursuit_chromie.description:
Cooldown: 25 seconds. Activate to reveal a targeted area for 2 Seconds. Enemies are revealed for 4 Seconds.
❢ Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1, up to 1.5
❢ Reward: After gathering 15 Globes you also gain 5% Ability Power.

PiercingSands_chromie.name: Piercing Sands
PiercingSands_chromie.description: Sand Blast will now hit the first two Heroes in its path.

BronzeTalons_chromie.name: Bronze Talons
BronzeTalons_chromie.description: Increases your Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of your next Basic Attack by 250%.

MobiusLoop_chromie.name: Mobius Loop
MobiusLoop_chromie.description: Reduces Dragon's Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 50%, but also reduces its damage by 25%.

DragonsEye_chromie.name: Dragon's Eye
DragonsEye_chromie.description: Dragon's Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

ChronoSickness_chromie.name: Chrono Sickness
ChronoSickness_chromie.description: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Stasis ends, the enemy is also slowed by 50% for 4 seconds.

SlowingSands_chromie.name: Slowing Sands
SlowingSands_chromie.description: Cooldown: 5 seconds. Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 50% after 5 seconds.

TemporalLoop_chromie.name: Temporal Loop
TemporalLoop_chromie.description: Cooldown: 75 seconds. Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where you cast Temporal Loop on them.

ByeBye_chromie.name: Bye Bye!
ByeBye_chromie.description: Reduces the cast time of your Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

ReachingthroughTime_chromie.name: Reaching through Time
ReachingthroughTime_chromie.description: Increases Sand Blast and Dragon’s Breath's range by 15%.

TimeOut_chromie.name: Time Out
TimeOut_chromie.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

ShiftingSands_chromie.name: Shifting Sands
ShiftingSands_chromie.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast increases your Ability Power by 8% for the next 10 seconds. This bonus can be stacked up to 40%, and the duration is refreshed whenever you damage enemy Heroes with Sand Blast.

FastForward_chromie.name: Fast Forward
FastForward_chromie.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

QuantumOverdrive_chromie.name: Quantum Overdrive
QuantumOverdrive_chromie.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Activate to increase Ability Power by 20% for 10 seconds.

PocketofTime_chromie.name: Pocket of Time
PocketofTime_chromie.description: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases the slow from 50% to 80%.

Loophole_chromie.name: Loophole
Loophole_chromie.description: Temporal Loop hits all enemy Heroes near your initial target.

PastandFutureMe_chromie.name: Past and Future Me
PastandFutureMe_chromie.description: After casting Sand Blast, leave an echo of yourself behind. The next time you cast Sand Blast, the echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that does 40% damage.

AndorhalAnomaly_chromie.name: Andorhal Anomaly
AndorhalAnomaly_chromie.description: You gain 3 charges of Time Trap, and can have 3 active at once. When your cooldown finishes, you gain 3 charges at once.

GatheringStorm_falstad.name: Gathering Storm
GatheringStorm_falstad.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5.. ❢ Reward: None

SeasonedMarksman_falstad.name: Seasoned Marksman
SeasonedMarksman_falstad.description:
❢ Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.. ❢ Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds.
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Wingman_falstad.name: Wingman
Wingman_falstad.description: Enemy Minions killed near you grant a stack of Bribe.  Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permenantly increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

StaticShield_falstad.name: Static Shield
StaticShield_falstad.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of your maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

Updraft_falstad.name: Updraft
Updraft_falstad.description: Increase Barrel Roll's range and Shield amount by 40%.

HammerGains_falstad.name: Hammer Gains
HammerGains_falstad.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

SecretWeapon_falstad.name: Secret Weapon
SecretWeapon_falstad.description: Increases Hammerang' range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

BOOMerang_falstad.name: BOOMerang
BOOMerang_falstad.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 384 (182 + 4% per level) damage around the Hammer.

ChargedUp_falstad.name: Charged Up
ChargedUp_falstad.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

HinterlandBlast_falstad.name: Hinterland Blast
HinterlandBlast_falstad.description: After a short delay, deal 901 (428 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within a long line.

MightyGust_falstad.name: Mighty Gust
MightyGust_falstad.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

Thunderstrikes_falstad.name: Thunderstrikes
Thunderstrikes_falstad.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

FlowRider_falstad.name: Flow Rider
FlowRider_falstad.description: While Tailwind is active, your Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

GiantKiller_falstad.name: Giant Killer
GiantKiller_falstad.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

CripplingHammer_falstad.name: Crippling Hammer
CripplingHammer_falstad.description: Increases the Hammerang's slow from 25% to 50%.

AerieGusts_falstad.name: Aerie Gusts
AerieGusts_falstad.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

Afterburner_falstad.name: Afterburner
Afterburner_falstad.description: Barrel Roll increases your Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

CalloftheWildhammer_falstad.name: Call of the Wildhammer
CalloftheWildhammer_falstad.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

WindTunnel_falstad.name: Wind Tunnel
WindTunnel_falstad.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

NexusFrenzy_falstad.name: Nexus Frenzy
NexusFrenzy_falstad.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 20%.

EpicMount_falstad.name: Epic Mount
EpicMount_falstad.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 30 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

SpurredOnward_gall.name: Spurred Onward
SpurredOnward_gall.description: Increase the Initial speed boost of Hurry Up, Oaf! to 70%. Hurry Up, Oaf! cooldown reduced by 2 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero with an Ability.

Shove_gall.name: Shove
Shove_gall.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds. Active: Nudge Cho a small distance in the direction you choose.

EyeofKilrogg_gall.name: Eye of Kilrogg
EyeofKilrogg_gall.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Active: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 4 charges.

BombsAway_gall.name: Bomb's Away
BombsAway_gall.description: Passive: Increases Cho's Rune Bomb range by 20%.

RunicPersistence_gall.name: Runic Persistence
RunicPersistence_gall.description: Using Runic Blast no longer destroys Rune Bomb.

DoubleBack_gall.name: Double Back
DoubleBack_gall.description: Dread Orb's third bounce instead bounces backwards.

EdgeofMadness_gall.name: Edge of Madness
EdgeofMadness_gall.description: Increases Shadowflame damage by 20% against nearby targets, and 10% to mid-range targets. Distant targets take normal damage.

DoubleTrouble_gall.name: Double Trouble
DoubleTrouble_gall.description: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero afflicted with Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

DarkDescent_gall.name: Dark Descent
DarkDescent_gall.description: Increases Runic Blast's damage by 5% everytime you get a Hero takedown, up to 20%. These bonuses are lost upon dying.

ShadowBoltVolley_gall.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
ShadowBoltVolley_gall.description: After 1 second, unleash 19.375 Shadow Bolts over 3.875 seconds, each dealing 103 damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

TwistingNether_gall.name: Twisting Nether
TwistingNether_gall.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 40% while you channel, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 342 damage.

RisingDread_gall.name: Rising Dread
RisingDread_gall.description: Dread Orb does 25% more damage on the second bounce and 75% more damage the third bounce.

SpeedofTwilight_gall.name: Speed of Twilight
SpeedofTwilight_gall.description: When Dread Orb hits an enemy Hero, gain 30% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

DreadShield_gall.name: Dread Shield
DreadShield_gall.description: When Dread Orb hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield absorbing 561 damage for 5 seconds.

TwilightNova_gall.name: Twilight Nova
TwilightNova_gall.description: After the first bounce, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

GiantScorcher_gall.name: Giant Scorcher
GiantScorcher_gall.description: Shadowflame also does 3.5% of a Hero's maximum Health.

Shadowflare_gall.name: Shadowflare
Shadowflare_gall.description: Increases Shadowflare's width by 50%. Enemies hit are slowed by 25% for 1 second.

Shadowfury_gall.name: Shadowfury
Shadowfury_gall.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

TheNetherCalls_gall.name: The Nether Calls
TheNetherCalls_gall.description: Increases Twisting Nether's slow by 10% and damage by 10% for every second channeled, to a maximum of 40% increase.

PsychoticBreak_gall.name: Psychotic Break
PsychoticBreak_gall.description: Passive: Increases your Ability Damage by 5%. Upon dying, the cooldown on your Heroic Ability is reset and you can continue to use Abilities for 10 seconds.

Wolfheart_greymane.name: Wolfheart
Wolfheart_greymane.description: While Inner Beast is active, each Basic Attack lowers its cooldown by 0.8 seconds.

PerfectAim_greymane.name: Perfect Aim
PerfectAim_greymane.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 50 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

Viciousness_greymane.name: Viciousness
Viciousness_greymane.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

ThickSkin_greymane.name: Thick Skin
ThickSkin_greymane.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%

Insatiable_greymane.name: Insatiable
Insatiable_greymane.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana, up to 140.

DraughtOverflow_greymane.name: Draught Overflow
DraughtOverflow_greymane.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

QuicksilverBullets_greymane.name: Quicksilver Bullets
QuicksilverBullets_greymane.description: Passive: Increases Human Basic Attack range by 20%.

IncendiaryElixir_greymane.name: Incendiary Elixir
IncendiaryElixir_greymane.description: ❢ Quest: Every time you hit an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail increase its explosion damage by 15, up to 225.. ❢ Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

WizenedDuelist_greymane.name: Wizened Duelist
WizenedDuelist_greymane.description: ❢ Quest: Hero takedowns increase Basic Attack damage by 3%, to a maximum of 30%. This bonus is lost on death.. ❢ Reward: None

GofortheThroat_greymane.name: Go for the Throat
GofortheThroat_greymane.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 921 (437 + 4% per level) total damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

MarkedfortheKill_greymane.name: Marked for the Kill
MarkedfortheKill_greymane.description: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a shot hitting the first enemy Hero in its path for 149 (71 + 4% per level) damage. For 5 seconds, their Armor is lowered by 25, taking 25% more damage. Each time Greymane damages the Marked Hero, the duration is refreshed.

RunningWild_greymane.name: Running Wild
RunningWild_greymane.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

VisceralAttacks_greymane.name: Visceral Attacks
VisceralAttacks_greymane.description: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

OntheProwl_greymane.name: On the Prowl
OntheProwl_greymane.description: Inner Beast increases your Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

UnfetteredAssault_greymane.name: Unfettered Assault
UnfetteredAssault_greymane.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

EagerWolf_greymane.name: Eager Wolf
EagerWolf_greymane.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

Executioner_greymane.name: Executioner
Executioner_greymane.description: Passive: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

AlphaKiller_greymane.name: Alpha Killer
AlphaKiller_greymane.description: Passive: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

Unleashed_greymane.name: Unleashed
Unleashed_greymane.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

GilneanRoulette_greymane.name: Gilnean Roulette
GilneanRoulette_greymane.description: Marked for the Kill's Armor reduction is now refreshed by any damage done to the Marked Hero.

HuntersBlunderbuss_greymane.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
HuntersBlunderbuss_greymane.description: Passive: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

ToothandClaw_greymane.name: Tooth and Claw
ToothandClaw_greymane.description: Passive: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

PursuitofFlame_guldan.name: Pursuit of Flame
PursuitofFlame_guldan.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.. ❢ Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

GlyphofDrainLife_guldan.name: Glyph of Drain Life
GlyphofDrainLife_guldan.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

EchoedCorruption_guldan.name: Echoed Corruption
EchoedCorruption_guldan.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.. ❢ Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

ChaoticEnergy_guldan.name: Chaotic Energy
ChaoticEnergy_guldan.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering a Regen Globe causes your next Basic Ability with a Mana cost to refund 40 Mana.. ❢ Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes your Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

HealthFunnel_guldan.name: Health Funnel
HealthFunnel_guldan.description: If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

ConsumeSoul_guldan.name: Consume Soul
ConsumeSoul_guldan.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Active: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 800 (380 + 4% per level) Health. Stores 2 charges.

BoundbyShadow_guldan.name: Bound by Shadow
BoundbyShadow_guldan.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

DevourtheFrail_guldan.name: Devour the Frail
DevourtheFrail_guldan.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

CurseofExhaustion_guldan.name: Curse of Exhaustion
CurseofExhaustion_guldan.description: Upon expiration, Corruption slows enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

HungerforPower_guldan.name: Hunger for Power
HungerforPower_guldan.description: Passive: Increases Ability Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

Horrify_guldan.name: Horrify
Horrify_guldan.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds. After a short delay, deal 263 (125 + 4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

RainofDestruction_guldan.name: Rain of Destruction
RainofDestruction_guldan.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds. Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 362 (172 + 4% per level) damage in a small area.

FelArmor_guldan.name: Fel Armor
FelArmor_guldan.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

HarvestLife_guldan.name: Harvest Life
HarvestLife_guldan.description: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

DarkBargain_guldan.name: Dark Bargain
DarkBargain_guldan.description: Your maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but your Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

Healthstone_guldan.name: Healthstone
Healthstone_guldan.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active: Activate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health.

RampantHellfire_guldan.name: Rampant Hellfire
RampantHellfire_guldan.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 8% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

RuinousAffliction_guldan.name: Ruinous Affliction
RuinousAffliction_guldan.description: Corruption deals an additional 171 (82 + 4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 511 (243 + 4% per level) damage.

DarknessWithin_guldan.name: Darkness Within
DarknessWithin_guldan.description: After using Life Tap, the next ability you cast has 25% increased Ability Power.

Haunt_guldan.name: Haunt
Haunt_guldan.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second and feared enemies lose 25 Armor, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

DeepImpact_guldan.name: Deep Impact
DeepImpact_guldan.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

DemonicCircle_guldan.name: Demonic Circle
DemonicCircle_guldan.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active: Summon a Demonic Circle at your location. Activate to teleport to the Demonic Circle.

Immolation_illidan.name: Immolation
Immolation_illidan.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 49 (23 + 4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

BatteredAssault_illidan.name: Battered Assault
BatteredAssault_illidan.description: IIncrease Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

UnendingHatred_illidan.name: Unending Hatred
UnendingHatred_illidan.description: ❢ Quest: Every Minion you kill gives you 0.1 Attack Damage. Every Takedown gives 1 Attack Damage.. ❢ Reward: Once you reach 20 Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Attack damage.

RapidChase_illidan.name: Rapid Chase
RapidChase_illidan.description: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

FriendorFoe_illidan.name: Friend or Foe
FriendorFoe_illidan.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used on allied Heroes without damaging them.

Unbound_illidan.name: Unbound
Unbound_illidan.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain..  ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

ReflexiveBlock_illidan.name: Reflexive Block
ReflexiveBlock_illidan.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

ThirstingBlade_illidan.name: Thirsting Blade
ThirstingBlade_illidan.description: Passive: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

HuntersOnslaught_illidan.name: Hunter's Onslaught
HuntersOnslaught_illidan.description: Passive: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. Double this bonus versus Heroes.

Metamorphosis_illidan.name: Metamorphosis
Metamorphosis_illidan.description: Cooldown: 120 seconds. Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 101 (48 + 4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 439 (208 + 4% per level) for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.

TheHunt_illidan.name: The Hunt
TheHunt_illidan.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Charge to target unit, dealing 550 (262 + 4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

NimbleDefender_illidan.name: Nimble Defender
NimbleDefender_illidan.description: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

ElusiveStrike_illidan.name: Elusive Strike
ElusiveStrike_illidan.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

SixthSense_illidan.name: Sixth Sense
SixthSense_illidan.description: Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

MarkedforDeath_illidan.name: Marked for Death
MarkedforDeath_illidan.description: Dive deals an extra 395 (188 + 4% per level) damage if you hit a target consecutively within 10 seconds.

FieryBrand_illidan.name: Fiery Brand
FieryBrand_illidan.description: Passive: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

BladesofAzzinoth_illidan.name: Blades of Azzinoth
BladesofAzzinoth_illidan.description: Active Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows you to activate Blades of Azzinoth to increase your Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

DemonicForm_illidan.name: Demonic Form
DemonicForm_illidan.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases your Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of slows, roots, and stuns against you by 50%. You can now mount in Demonic Form.

NowheretoHide_illidan.name: Nowhere to Hide
NowheretoHide_illidan.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. You passively reveal enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

NexusBlades_illidan.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_illidan.description: Passive: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

BoltoftheStorm_illidan.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm_illidan.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds. Active Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

WintersReach_jaina.name: Winter's Reach
WintersReach_jaina.description: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

LingeringChill_jaina.name: Lingering Chill
LingeringChill_jaina.description: Passive: Increases the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

DeepChill_jaina.name: Deep Chill
DeepChill_jaina.description: Passive: Increases the slow of Chill from 25% to 30%.

ConjurersPursuit_jaina.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
ConjurersPursuit_jaina.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2.5 per second.. ❢ Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, also increase your maximum Mana by 100.

FrostShards_jaina.name: Frost Shards
FrostShards_jaina.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

ArcaneIntellect_jaina.name: Arcane Intellect
ArcaneIntellect_jaina.description: Passive: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and abilities return 20.

FrostArmor_jaina.name: Frost Armor
FrostArmor_jaina.description: Enemy Heroes that attack you are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, gain 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

IceFloes_jaina.name: Ice Floes
IceFloes_jaina.description: Doubles the width of Cone of Cold and causes each target hit to reduce its cooldown by 1 seconds, to a maximum of 5 seconds per cast.

Frostbitten_jaina.name: Frostbitten
Frostbitten_jaina.description: Increases the damage bonus of Frostbite from 50% to 65%.

IceLance_jaina.name: Ice Lance
IceLance_jaina.description: When Frostbolt hits a Chilled target its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and you regain 10 Mana.

RingofFrost_jaina.name: Ring of Frost
RingofFrost_jaina.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

SummonWaterElemental_jaina.name: Summon Water Elemental
SummonWaterElemental_jaina.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

StormFront_jaina.name: Storm Front
StormFront_jaina.description: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

IceBarrier_jaina.name: Ice Barrier
IceBarrier_jaina.description: Passive: When Jaina does increased damage from Frostbite, she is shielded for 25% of the total damage dealt. This Shield lasts 4 seconds.

IcyVeins_jaina.name: Icy Veins
IcyVeins_jaina.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active Activate to make your Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge three times as fast and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

Snowstorm_jaina.name: Snowstorm
Snowstorm_jaina.description: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

NorthernExposure_jaina.name: Northern Exposure
NorthernExposure_jaina.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

NumbingBlast_jaina.name: Numbing Blast
NumbingBlast_jaina.description: Cone of Cold also roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

ColdSnap_jaina.name: Cold Snap
ColdSnap_jaina.description: The center of the ring also explodes with frost after the first ring expires.

Wintermute_jaina.name: Wintermute
Wintermute_jaina.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic your Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

ImprovedIceBlock_jaina.name: Improved Ice Block
ImprovedIceBlock_jaina.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds. Active Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 2.5 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.

ArcanePower_jaina.name: Arcane Power
ArcanePower_jaina.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active Activate to instantly restore 400 Mana and increase Ability Power by 15% for 10 seconds.

Convection_kaelthas.name: Convection
Convection_kaelthas.description: ❢ Quest: When Flamestrike damages an enemy Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 100. Lose all damage bonuses if you die.. ❢ Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose the bonus if you die.

FelInfusion_kaelthas.name: Fel Infusion
FelInfusion_kaelthas.description: Increases your Ability Power by 4%. Heal for 94 Health when you activate Verdant Spheres.

ManaAddict_kaelthas.name: Mana Addict
ManaAddict_kaelthas.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your maximum Mana by 15.. ❢ Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, you can also activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of your maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

NetherWind_kaelthas.name: Nether Wind
NetherWind_kaelthas.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

EnergyRoil_kaelthas.name: Energy Roil
EnergyRoil_kaelthas.description: When Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

ManaTap_kaelthas.name: Mana Tap
ManaTap_kaelthas.description: Activating Verdante Spheres restores 4% of your maximum Mana.

BurnedFlesh_kaelthas.name: Burned Flesh
BurnedFlesh_kaelthas.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage to 8% of their maximum Health.

SunKingsFury_kaelthas.name: Sun King's Fury
SunKingsFury_kaelthas.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

SunfireEnchantment_kaelthas.name: Sunfire Enchantment
SunfireEnchantment_kaelthas.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes your next Basic Attack to instead shoot a spell dealing 362 (165 + 4% per level) damage.

Phoenix_kaelthas.name: Phoenix
Phoenix_kaelthas.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 171 damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 171 damage and splashing for 50%.

Pyroblast_kaelthas.name: Pyroblast
Pyroblast_kaelthas.description: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 2150 damage to an enemy Hero and 1075 damage to enemies nearby.

Pyromaniac_kaelthas.name: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac_kaelthas.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns are refreshed by 1 second.

Backdraft_kaelthas.name: Backdraft
Backdraft_kaelthas.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemies Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

FissionBomb_kaelthas.name: Fission Bomb
FissionBomb_kaelthas.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

FuryoftheSunwell_kaelthas.name: Fury of the Sunwell
FuryoftheSunwell_kaelthas.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

TwinSpheres_kaelthas.name: Twin Spheres
TwinSpheres_kaelthas.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

ArcaneDynamo_kaelthas.name: Arcane Dynamo
ArcaneDynamo_kaelthas.description: Passive: Using a Basic Ability increases your Ability Power by 3% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 15%.

Rebirth_kaelthas.name: Rebirth
Rebirth_kaelthas.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. You may order the Phoenix to move to a different location once while the Phoenix is alive.

PresenceOfMind_kaelthas.name: Presence Of Mind
PresenceOfMind_kaelthas.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50% and reduces its cooldown by 25 seconds per enemy Hero hit.

MasterofFlames_kaelthas.name: Master of Flames
MasterofFlames_kaelthas.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

Flamethrower_kaelthas.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower_kaelthas.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If you hit 2 or more Heroes, Flamestrike's cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

SiphoningImpact_kerrigan.name: Siphoning Impact
SiphoningImpact_kerrigan.description: If the targeted enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, Kerrigan heals for 10% of her maximum Health.

EnergizingGrasp_kerrigan.name: Energizing Grasp
EnergizingGrasp_kerrigan.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Primal Grasp by 75%.

Block_kerrigan.name: Block
Block_kerrigan.description: Passive: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

CleanKill_kerrigan.name: Clean Kill
CleanKill_kerrigan.description: If Ravage kills the target, it restores 75% of its Mana cost and increases the damage of your next Ravage by 25%.

PsionicPulse_kerrigan.name: Psionic Pulse
PsionicPulse_kerrigan.description: After casting Primal Grasp, deal 88 (42 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

FuryoftheSwarm_kerrigan.name: Fury of the Swarm
FuryoftheSwarm_kerrigan.description: Passive: Basic Attacks splash for 60% damage around the target.

Envenom_kerrigan.name: Envenom
Envenom_kerrigan.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 damage over 10 seconds.

Adaptation_kerrigan.name: Adaptation
Adaptation_kerrigan.description: Ravage can be used to jump to allies, refunding 50% of the cooldown and 100% of the Mana cost.

AssimilationMastery_kerrigan.name: Assimilation Mastery
AssimilationMastery_kerrigan.description: Passive: Increases the duration of Assimilation by 100%. While Assimilation Shields are active your Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 100%.

BladedMomentum_kerrigan.name: Bladed Momentum
BladedMomentum_kerrigan.description: Passive: Basic Attacks reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.6 seconds.

Maelstrom_kerrigan.name: Maelstrom
Maelstrom_kerrigan.description: Deals 82 damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

SummonUltralisk_kerrigan.name: Summon Ultralisk
SummonUltralisk_kerrigan.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 91 damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

LingeringEssence_kerrigan.name: Lingering Essence
LingeringEssence_kerrigan.description: Increases Assimilation Shield's duration to 20 seconds.

DoubleStrike_kerrigan.name: Double Strike
DoubleStrike_kerrigan.description: Passive: When your Basic Abilities damage an enemy, your next Basic Attack hits for 75% bonus damage.

QueensRush_kerrigan.name: Queen's Rush
QueensRush_kerrigan.description: Cooldown: 50 seconds. Active: Activate to increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. Queen's Rush is also applied for free on Takedowns.

AggressiveDefense_kerrigan.name: Aggressive Defense
AggressiveDefense_kerrigan.description: Passive: Increases base Shield amount gained from Assimilation by 100%.

EssenceforEssence_kerrigan.name: Essence for Essence
EssenceforEssence_kerrigan.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and gain Assimilation Shields for twice that amount.

Overdrive_kerrigan.name: Overdrive
Overdrive_kerrigan.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds. Active: Activate to increase Ability Power by 25% and Mana costs by 40% for 5 seconds.

Omegastorm_kerrigan.name: Omegastorm
Omegastorm_kerrigan.description: Maelstrom size increased by 25% . Amount of Assimilation Shields generated by Maelstrom increased by 100%.

Torrasque_kerrigan.name: Torrasque
Torrasque_kerrigan.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

NexusBlades_kerrigan.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_kerrigan.description: Passive: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

BoltoftheStorm_kerrigan.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm_kerrigan.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds. Active: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

AstralPresence_liming.name: Astral Presence
AstralPresence_liming.description: Passive: Your Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 25% Mana.

PowerHungry_liming.name: Power Hungry
PowerHungry_liming.description: Passive: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Ability Power for 20 seconds.

ForceArmor_liming.name: Force Armor
ForceArmor_liming.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can only gain 1 charge per cast, up to 4 charges maximum.

AetherWalker_liming.name: Aether Walker
AetherWalker_liming.description: If you haven't taken damage in the last 5 seconds, Teleport costs no Mana and its cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.

ChargedBlast_liming.name: Charged Blast
ChargedBlast_liming.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 191 (91 + 4% per level) damage.

Triumvirate_liming.name: Triumvirate
Triumvirate_liming.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

Dominance_liming.name: Dominance
Dominance_liming.description: Passive: Takedowns restore 20% of your maximum Health.

Seeker_liming.name: Seeker
Seeker_liming.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 274 (130 + 4% per level) damage.

ZeisVengeance_liming.name: Zei's Vengeance
ZeisVengeance_liming.description: Arcane Orb does up to 25% more damage to enemies based on distance. Additionally, it's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

Calamity_liming.name: Calamity
Calamity_liming.description: Teleport does 542 (309 + 3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near your destination.

Disintegrate_liming.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate_liming.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 1168 (462 + 5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

WaveofForce_liming.name: Wave of Force
WaveofForce_liming.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 425 (168 + 5% per level) damage.

Cannoneer_liming.name: Cannoneer
Cannoneer_liming.description: Passive: When you use an Ability, increase your next Basic Attack by 75% and cause it to deal Ability damage. Stacks up to 3 times.

GlassCannon_liming.name: Glass Cannon
GlassCannon_liming.description: Passive: Increases your Ability Power by 15%, but decreases your maximum Health by 15%.

Illusionist_liming.name: Illusionist
Illusionist_liming.description: Increases Teleport range by 50%, and if you lose more than 20% of your Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed. This cannot happen more than once every 4 seconds.

Fireflies_liming.name: Fireflies
Fireflies_liming.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

Mirrorball_liming.name: Mirrorball
Mirrorball_liming.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

ArcaneOrbit_liming.name: Arcane Orbit
ArcaneOrbit_liming.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, doing up to 25% more damage.

DiamondSkin_liming.name: Diamond Skin
DiamondSkin_liming.description: When you Teleport, gain 20% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 4 seconds.

TemporalFlux_liming.name: Temporal Flux
TemporalFlux_liming.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

Repulsion_liming.name: Repulsion
Repulsion_liming.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

TalRashasElements_liming.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
TalRashasElements_liming.description: Passive: Using abilities grants 5% Ability Power, up to a maximum of 20%. This bonus is reset when the same ability is used within a chain.

ArchonPurePower_liming.name: Archon: Pure Power
ArchonPurePower_liming.description: Active: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing you to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

Photosynthesis_lunara.name: Photosynthesis
Photosynthesis_lunara.description: Crippling Spores returns 10 Mana per enemy hit, up to 40 Mana.

NaturalPerspective_lunara.name: Natural Perspective
NaturalPerspective_lunara.description: Passive: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

CruelSpores_lunara.name: Cruel Spores
CruelSpores_lunara.description: When Crippling Spores hits only Minions or Mercenaries, its cooldown is reduced by 80% and 20 mana is restored.

NimbleWisp_lunara.name: Nimble Wisp
NimbleWisp_lunara.description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

TimelostWisp_lunara.name: Timelost Wisp
TimelostWisp_lunara.description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

SkyboundWisp_lunara.name: Skybound Wisp
SkyboundWisp_lunara.description: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

DividingWisp_lunara.name: Dividing Wisp
DividingWisp_lunara.description: The first time you relocate a Wisp it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location.

SiphoningToxin_lunara.name: Siphoning Toxin
SiphoningToxin_lunara.description: Passive: As long as you have Nature's Toxin active on an enemy you heal for 40 (19 + 4% per level) Health a second.

WildVigor_lunara.name: Wild Vigor
WildVigor_lunara.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of your next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

SplinteredSpear_lunara.name: Splintered Spear
SplinteredSpear_lunara.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes your next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's toxin.

NaturesCulling_lunara.name: Nature's Culling
NaturesCulling_lunara.description: Passive: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 150% to non-Heroic enemies.

ThornwoodVine_lunara.name: Thornwood Vine
ThornwoodVine_lunara.description: Send forth vines that deal 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

LeapingStrike_lunara.name: Leaping Strike
LeapingStrike_lunara.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and attacking for 594 (286 + 4% per level) damage. Has 2 charges.

UnfairAdvantage_lunara.name: Unfair Advantage
UnfairAdvantage_lunara.description: Passive: Nature's Toxin deals 50% more damage to Heroes that are slowed.

GiantKiller_lunara.name: Giant Killer
GiantKiller_lunara.description: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

GreaterSpellShield_lunara.name: Greater Spell Shield
GreaterSpellShield_lunara.description: Passive: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

ChokingPollen_lunara.name: Choking Pollen
ChokingPollen_lunara.description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 125% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

StarWoodSpear_lunara.name: Star Wood Spear
StarWoodSpear_lunara.description: Using Crippling Spores increases your Basic Attacks range by 50% for 6 seconds.

InvigoratingSpores_lunara.name: Invigorating Spores
InvigoratingSpores_lunara.description: Using Crippling Spores increases your Attack Speed by 50% for 6 seconds.

LetThemWither_lunara.name: Let Them Wither
LetThemWither_lunara.description: Increases Crippling Spores' slow to 50%, and causes it to no longer decay.

ForestsWrath_lunara.name: Forest's Wrath
ForestsWrath_lunara.description: Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30%, its speed by 20%, and your vision radius by 35%.

BoundlessStride_lunara.name: Boundless Stride
BoundlessStride_lunara.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 20 seconds. You can also use Leaping Strike on allies.

GallopingGait_lunara.name: Galloping Gait
GallopingGait_lunara.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

AbolishMagic_lunara.name: Abolish Magic
AbolishMagic_lunara.description: Cooldown: 35 seconds. Active: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and yourself. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

AdvancedCloaking_nova.name: Advanced Cloaking
AdvancedCloaking_nova.description: Passive: While Stealthed, Nova gains 2 Mana per second and 25% movement speed.

Longshot_nova.name: Longshot
Longshot_nova.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases your next Basic Attack range by 30%.

CovertOps_nova.name: Covert Ops
CovertOps_nova.description: Increases Pinning Shot's slow by 2% for every second that Nova is Cloaked, to a maximum of a 50%. Bonus fades when Nova is un-Cloaked for 1 second.

RemoteDelivery_nova.name: Remote Delivery
RemoteDelivery_nova.description: Increases Holo Decoy cast range by 100% and its sight range by 50%.

RapidProjection_nova.name: Rapid Projection
RapidProjection_nova.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

HoloStability_nova.name: Holo Stability
HoloStability_nova.description: Increases the duration of Holo Decoy by 120%.

CovertMission_nova.name: Covert Mission
CovertMission_nova.description: Active. Enemy minions killed near you grant stacks. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks. Use 25 stacks to bribe a mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

OneintheChamber_nova.name: One in the Chamber
OneintheChamber_nova.description: Passive: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 80% additional damage.

AntiArmorShells_nova.name: Anti-Armor Shells
AntiArmorShells_nova.description: Passive: Your Basic Attacks deal 250% damage, but your Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

SnipeMaster_nova.name: Snipe Master
SnipeMaster_nova.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy Hero.

TripleTap_nova.name: Triple Tap
TripleTap_nova.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 741 (352 + 4% per level) damage each.

PrecisionStrike_nova.name: Precision Strike
PrecisionStrike_nova.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 1000 (475 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

PsionicEfficiency_nova.name: Psionic Efficiency
PsionicEfficiency_nova.description: Removes Snipe's Mana cost and increases its range by 10%.

ExplosiveRound_nova.name: Explosive Round
ExplosiveRound_nova.description: Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact.

PerfectShot_nova.name: Perfect Shot
PerfectShot_nova.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipereduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.

CripplingShot_nova.name: Crippling Shot
CripplingShot_nova.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

LethalDecoy_nova.name: Lethal Decoy
LethalDecoy_nova.description: Holo Decoy does 40% of Nova's damage.

FastReload_nova.name: Fast Reload
FastReload_nova.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

PrecisionBarrage_nova.name: Precision Barrage
PrecisionBarrage_nova.description: Precision Strike holds two charges with a short cooldown.

Rewind_nova.name: Rewind
Rewind_nova.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

GhostProtocol_nova.name: Ghost Protocol
GhostProtocol_nova.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active: Activate to gain Stealth and become unrevealable for 2 seconds. You do not lose Stealth from  attacking, or using Abilities during this time.

SulfurasHungers_ragnaros.name: Sulfuras Hungers
SulfurasHungers_ragnaros.description: ❢ Quest: Every time you kill a Minion with Empower Sulfuras, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30.. ❢ Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

ShiftingMeteor_ragnaros.name: Shifting Meteor
ShiftingMeteor_ragnaros.description: ❢ Quest: Hit 75 heroes with Living Meteor.. ❢ Reward: Duration is increased by 30%, and you can recast the Ability to change its direction once per cast.

EngulfingFlame_ragnaros.name: Engulfing Flame
EngulfingFlame_ragnaros.description: Blast Wave's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds, and its radius is increased by 15%.

FireWard_ragnaros.name: Fire Ward
FireWard_ragnaros.description: When Living Meteor hits an Enemy Hero, you gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy ability against you by 50%. Can hold up to 2 charges.

SlowBurn_ragnaros.name: Slow Burn
SlowBurn_ragnaros.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

CatchingFire_ragnaros.name: Catching Fire
CatchingFire_ragnaros.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 2 per second, up to 30.. ❢ Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, you can activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

HandofRagnaros_ragnaros.name: Hand of Ragnaros
HandofRagnaros_ragnaros.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

MoltenPower_ragnaros.name: Molten Power
MoltenPower_ragnaros.description: Each enemy hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of your next Living Meteor by 15%, up to a maximum of 75%.

Superheated_ragnaros.name: Superheated
Superheated_ragnaros.description: When you cast Blast Wave on yourself, it deals 100% increased damage.

SulfurasSmash_ragnaros.name: Sulfuras Smash
SulfurasSmash_ragnaros.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Hurl Sulfuras at the target area. It lands after 0.75 seconds, dealing 187 damage (+4% per level). Enemies in the center take an additional 374 damage (+4% per level) and are stunned for 0.5 seconds.

LavaWave_ragnaros.name: Lava Wave
LavaWave_ragnaros.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds. Release a wave of lava from your Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 603 damage (+4% per level) per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 33% versus Heroes.

CauterizedWounds_ragnaros.name: Cauterized Wounds
CauterizedWounds_ragnaros.description: Empower Sulfuras heals you for an additional 60% of the damage dealt to heroes over 2 seconds.

TemperedFlame_ragnaros.name: Tempered Flame
TemperedFlame_ragnaros.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, you gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

ResilientFlame_ragnaros.name: Resilient Flame
ResilientFlame_ragnaros.description: While Stunned gain 50 Armor for 3 seconds reducing damage taken by 50%.

GiantScorcher_ragnaros.name: Giant Scorcher
GiantScorcher_ragnaros.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 6% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal you.

MeteorBomb_ragnaros.name: Meteor Bomb
MeteorBomb_ragnaros.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 229 damage (+4% per level) to all nearby enemies.

BlastEcho_ragnaros.name: Blast Echo
BlastEcho_ragnaros.description: After Blast Wave explodes, cast another Blast Wave on yourself. Can only occur once per cast.

FlamesofSulfuron_ragnaros.name: Flames of Sulfuron
FlamesofSulfuron_ragnaros.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

LavaSurge_ragnaros.name: Lava Surge
LavaSurge_ragnaros.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

HeroicDifficulty_ragnaros.name: Heroic Difficulty
HeroicDifficulty_ragnaros.description: Your Health and damage are increased by 25% while in Molten Core, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

Submerge_ragnaros.name: Submerge
Submerge_ragnaros.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds. Activate to place yourself in stasis and heal for 624 Health (+4% per level) over 3 seconds.

SeasonedMarksman_raynor.name: Seasoned Marksman
SeasonedMarksman_raynor.description: ❢ Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.. ❢ Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

ScoutingDrone_raynor.name: Scouting Drone
ScoutingDrone_raynor.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Active: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

FocusedAttack_raynor.name: Focused Attack
FocusedAttack_raynor.description: Passive: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

VigorousAssault_raynor.name: Vigorous Assault
VigorousAssault_raynor.description: Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

ConfidentAim_raynor.name: Confident Aim
ConfidentAim_raynor.description: Lowers the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 4 seconds if it hits an enemy Hero.

RelentlessLeader_raynor.name: Relentless Leader
RelentlessLeader_raynor.description: Once every 8 seconds, if you are stunned or rooted you knock nearby enemies away and reduce the cooldown of Adrenaline Rush by 15 seconds.

HamstringShot_raynor.name: Hamstring Shot
HamstringShot_raynor.description: Enemies hit by Penetrating Round have a 20% Movement Speed slow for 3 seconds.

RevolutionOverdrive_raynor.name: Revolution Overdrive
RevolutionOverdrive_raynor.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while affected by Inspire. Increase this bonus by 5% for each allied Hero nearby when Inspire is cast.

FightorFlight_raynor.name: Fight or Flight
FightorFlight_raynor.description: Whenever Adrenaline Rush activates it gives 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds. Adrenaline Rush can also be manually activated.

PuttinOnaClinic_raynor.name: Puttin' On a Clinic
PuttinOnaClinic_raynor.description: Passive: Whenever an enemy Minion you have recently damaged is destroyed, your Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1.5 seconds.

Hyperion_raynor.name: Hyperion
Hyperion_raynor.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

RaynorsRaiders_raynor.name: Raynor's Raiders
RaynorsRaiders_raynor.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 43.2 damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

GiantKiller_raynor.name: Giant Killer
GiantKiller_raynor.description: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

DoubleBarreled_raynor.name: Double-Barreled
DoubleBarreled_raynor.description: Penetrating Round gains a second charge.

SteelResolve_raynor.name: Steel Resolve
SteelResolve_raynor.description: Increases Inspire's duration by 50% and causes Adrenaline Rush to also apply Inspire.

Executioner_raynor.name: Executioner
Executioner_raynor.description: Passive: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

ClusterRound_raynor.name: Cluster Round
ClusterRound_raynor.description: Penetrating Round damage is increased by 20% for each additional target hit up to 100%, and the width is increased by 50%.

Bullseye_raynor.name: Bullseye
Bullseye_raynor.description: The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1 second.

ScorchedEarth_raynor.name: Scorched Earth
ScorchedEarth_raynor.description: Heroic. An additional set of lasers blast the ground 5 times per second, dealing 40 damage in an area.

DuskWings_raynor.name: Dusk Wings
DuskWings_raynor.description: Heroic. Banshees remain Stealthed while attacking and fire 50% more frequently.

ACardtoPlay_raynor.name: A Card to Play
ACardtoPlay_raynor.description: Passive: Whenever a Hero (ally or enemy) is killed, the cooldown of your Heroic Ability is reduced by 15 seconds.

NexusFrenzy_raynor.name: Nexus Frenzy
NexusFrenzy_raynor.description: Passive: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 20%.

BoltoftheStorm_raynor.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm_raynor.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds. Active: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

WayofIllusion_samuro.name: Way of Illusion
WayofIllusion_samuro.description: ❢ Quest: Every time one of your Images Critically Strikes a Hero, gain 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20.. ❢ Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, gain an additional 20 Attack Damage.

WayoftheBlade_samuro.name: Way of the Blade
WayoftheBlade_samuro.description: Critical Strike now happens every 3rd Basic Attack and deals an additional 25% of your Basic Attack damage.

WayoftheWind_samuro.name: Way of the Wind
WayoftheWind_samuro.description: ❢ Quest: Attacking a Hero from Wind Walk increases the Movement Speed bonus of Wind Walk by 1.25%, up to 25%.. ❢ Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Wind Walk's Unrevealable duration is increased to 2.5 seconds.

Mirage_samuro.name: Mirage
Mirage_samuro.description: Mirror Image grants you and your Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing damage taken by 40%.

OnewiththeWind_samuro.name: One with the Wind
OnewiththeWind_samuro.description: While Stealthed by Wind Walk, gain 60 Armor, taking 60% reduced damage from all sources.

Deflection_samuro.name: Deflection
Deflection_samuro.description: Passive: Advancing Strikes grants 25 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 25%.

BurningBlade_samuro.name: Burning Blade
BurningBlade_samuro.description: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 65% of your Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

PhantomPain_samuro.name: Phantom Pain
PhantomPain_samuro.description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 40% of your Basic Attack damage for each Image you have active.

CrushingBlows_samuro.name: Crushing Blows
CrushingBlows_samuro.description: Critical Strike now has two charges, and Critical Strikes deal an additional 25% of your Basic Attack damage.

Bladestorm_samuro.name: Bladestorm
Bladestorm_samuro.description: Cooldown: 110 seconds. Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 548 (260 + 4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

IllusionMaster_samuro.name: Illusion Master
IllusionMaster_samuro.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds. Switch places with the target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the target Mirror Image.
Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 10% of your damage.

MirroredSteel_samuro.name: Mirrored Steel
MirroredSteel_samuro.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

Kawarimi_samuro.name: Kawarimi
Kawarimi_samuro.description: Wind Walk creates an Image at your location that will continue whatever you were doing.

Shukuchi_samuro.name: Shukuchi
Shukuchi_samuro.description: Wind Walk teleports you a short distance in the direction you're currently facing.

MercilessStrikes_samuro.name: Merciless Strikes
MercilessStrikes_samuro.description: Basic Attacks against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets are always Critical Strikes.

HarshWinds_samuro.name: Harsh Winds
HarshWinds_samuro.description: Attacking a Hero from Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from you and your Images for 3 seconds.

PresstheAttack_samuro.name: Press the Attack
PresstheAttack_samuro.description: Passive: While Advancing Strikes is active, Basic Attacks increase your Attack Speed by 15%, up to 60%.

DanceofDeath_samuro.name: Dance of Death
DanceofDeath_samuro.description: Your Images use Bladestorm when you do.

ThreeBladeStyle_samuro.name: Three Blade Style
ThreeBladeStyle_samuro.description: Your Images gain an additional 50% of your Health, and last up to 36 seconds.

WindStrider_samuro.name: Wind Strider
WindStrider_samuro.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

BlademastersPursuit_samuro.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
BlademastersPursuit_samuro.description: Passive: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

Invigoration_thebutcher.name: Invigoration
Invigoration_thebutcher.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

Block_thebutcher.name: Block
Block_thebutcher.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

ChopMeat_thebutcher.name: Chop Meat
ChopMeat_thebutcher.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

Abattoir_thebutcher.name: Abattoir
Abattoir_thebutcher.description: Decreases the amount of Fresh Meat lost on death from 10 to 5. Once you complete the Fresh Meat quest, Heroes continue to drop Meat that grants Attack Damage. This bonus Meat is not lost on death.

FlailAxe_thebutcher.name: Flail Axe
FlailAxe_thebutcher.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

UnrelentingPursuit_thebutcher.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
UnrelentingPursuit_thebutcher.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

CheapShot_thebutcher.name: Cheap Shot
CheapShot_thebutcher.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a slow, root, or stun.

InsatiableBlade_thebutcher.name: Insatiable Blade
InsatiableBlade_thebutcher.description: Increases Butcher's Brand's healing from 75% to 100% of your Basic Attack damage. While facing the branded enemy, your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.

Victuals_thebutcher.name: Victuals
Victuals_thebutcher.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, you regain 4% of your maximum Health.

MeatShield_thebutcher.name: Meat Shield
MeatShield_thebutcher.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability damage taken by 50%.

FurnaceBlast_thebutcher.name: Furnace Blast
FurnaceBlast_thebutcher.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing 1096 (520 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

LambtotheSlaughter_thebutcher.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
LambtotheSlaughter_thebutcher.description: Cooldown: 80 seconds. Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

Cleaver_thebutcher.name: Cleaver
Cleaver_thebutcher.description: Passive: Basic Attack deal 35% of your Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

SavageCharge_thebutcher.name: Savage Charge
SavageCharge_thebutcher.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

BrutalStrike_thebutcher.name: Brutal Strike
BrutalStrike_thebutcher.description: After using Hamstring, your next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

CripplingSlam_thebutcher.name: Crippling Slam
CripplingSlam_thebutcher.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 25%.

Enraged_thebutcher.name: Enraged
Enraged_thebutcher.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds. Receiving damage that reduces you below 50% of your maximum Health causes you to become Enraged for 10 seconds. While Enraged, you gain 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.

BloodFrenzy_thebutcher.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy_thebutcher.description: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase your Attack and Movement Speed by 5% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

FiresofHell_thebutcher.name: Fires of Hell
FiresofHell_thebutcher.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

Slaughterhouse_thebutcher.name: Slaughterhouse
Slaughterhouse_thebutcher.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

NexusBlades_thebutcher.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_thebutcher.description: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.

BoltoftheStorm_thebutcher.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm_thebutcher.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds. Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Block_thrall.name: Block
Block_thrall.description: Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges.

RollingThunder_thrall.name: Rolling Thunder
RollingThunder_thrall.description: Increases Chain Lightning's range by 30% and attacking enemies recently hit by Chain Lightning restores 10 Mana.

RabidWolves_thrall.name: Rabid Wolves
RabidWolves_thrall.description: Damaging Heroes with Feral Spirit grants 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

SeasonedMarksman_thrall.name: Seasoned Marksman
SeasonedMarksman_thrall.description: ❢ Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.. ❢ Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

RideTheLightning_thrall.name: Ride The Lightning
RideTheLightning_thrall.description: Chain Lightning can hit 2 additional enemies for 50% damage.

Envenom_thrall.name: Envenom
Envenom_thrall.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 damage over 10 seconds.

WindShear_thrall.name: Wind Shear
WindShear_thrall.description: Reduces the cooldown of Windfury by 4 seconds.

StoneWolves_thrall.name: Stone Wolves
StoneWolves_thrall.description: Increases the duration of Feral Spirit's root from 1 second to 1.5 seconds.

FollowThrough_thrall.name: Follow Through
FollowThrough_thrall.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

FrostwolfsGrace_thrall.name: Frostwolf's Grace
FrostwolfsGrace_thrall.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to immediately heal you.

Sundering_thrall.name: Sundering
Sundering_thrall.description: Cooldown: 75 seconds. After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 601 (285 + 4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.0 seconds.

Earthquake_thrall.name: Earthquake
Earthquake_thrall.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 2 seconds. Each pulse slows all enemies in the area by 70%, and deals 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes . Does 3 pulses..

RestlessWolves_thrall.name: Restless Wolves
RestlessWolves_thrall.description: If Feral Spirit hits an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

GraceOfAir_thrall.name: Grace Of Air
GraceOfAir_thrall.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

GiantKiller_thrall.name: Giant Killer
GiantKiller_thrall.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

SpellShield_thrall.name: Spell Shield
SpellShield_thrall.description: Cooldown: 0.75 seconds. Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds. Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

ForkedLightning_thrall.name: Forked Lightning
ForkedLightning_thrall.description: Allows Chain Lightning to hold 2 charges that can be used in quick succession.

TempestFury_thrall.name: Tempest Fury
TempestFury_thrall.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

RideTheWind_thrall.name: Ride The Wind
RideTheWind_thrall.description: Increases Windfury's Movement Speed bonus from 30% to 40%. Windfury attacks increase the Movement Speed duration by 1 second.

BloodforBlood_thrall.name: Blood for Blood
BloodforBlood_thrall.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

EarthenShields_thrall.name: Earthen Shields
EarthenShields_thrall.description: You and your allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of max Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

NexusBlades_thrall.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_thrall.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

BoltoftheStorm_thrall.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm_thrall.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds. Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

PulseStrike_tracer.name: Pulse Strike
PulseStrike_tracer.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

Slipstream_tracer.name: Slipstream
Slipstream_tracer.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

TracerRounds_tracer.name: Tracer Rounds
TracerRounds_tracer.description: Passive: Your Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

PartingGift_tracer.name: Parting Gift
PartingGift_tracer.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 526 (250 + 4% per level) damage each to different targets.

IsThataHealthPack_tracer.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
IsThataHealthPack_tracer.description: Passive:Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

Untouchable_tracer.name: Untouchable
Untouchable_tracer.description: Passive: ❢ Quest: Takedowns increase your Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.. ❢ Reward: None

BulletTime_tracer.name: Bullet Time
BulletTime_tracer.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.1 seconds.

SpatialEcho_tracer.name: Spatial Echo
SpatialEcho_tracer.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

StickyBomb_tracer.name: Sticky Bomb
StickyBomb_tracer.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

QuantumSpike_tracer.name: Quantum Spike
QuantumSpike_tracer.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 10% of the primary target's maximum Health.

PulseRounds_tracer.name: Pulse Rounds
PulseRounds_tracer.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

BulletSpray_tracer.name: Bullet Spray
BulletSpray_tracer.description: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

Ricochet_tracer.name: Ricochet
Ricochet_tracer.description: Passive: Your Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

LeechingRounds_tracer.name: Leeching Rounds
LeechingRounds_tracer.description: Passive: Your Basic Attacks against Heroes heal you for 20% of their damage dealt.

SleightofHand_tracer.name: Sleight of Hand
SleightofHand_tracer.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

FocusFire_tracer.name: Focus Fire
FocusFire_tracer.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 191 (91 + 4% per level) bonus damage. This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

LockedandLoaded_tracer.name: Locked and Loaded
LockedandLoaded_tracer.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase your Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

GetStuffed_tracer.name: Get Stuffed!
GetStuffed_tracer.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away from you.

TotalRecall_tracer.name: Total Recall
TotalRecall_tracer.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals you equal to the amount of Health you lost during that time.

CompositionB_tracer.name: Composition B
CompositionB_tracer.description: If you successfully stick a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero, you also drop another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

PresstheAdvantage_tychus.name: Press the Advantage
PresstheAdvantage_tychus.description: Run and Gun increases your Basic Attack range by 35% for 4 seconds.

Dash_tychus.name: Dash
Dash_tychus.description: ❢ Quest: Run and Gun increases your Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe you gather, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds.. ❢ Reward: Once you have gathered 25 Regeneration Globes, also increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%.

CombatTactician_tychus.name: Combat Tactician
CombatTactician_tychus.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

IntheRhythm_tychus.name: In the Rhythm
IntheRhythm_tychus.description: ❢ Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attack against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by .03 seconds.. ❢ Reward: None

TheBiggerTheyAre_tychus.name: The Bigger They Are...
TheBiggerTheyAre_tychus.description: Increases Minigun damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 40% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 40%.

MasterAssassin_tychus.name: Master Assassin
MasterAssassin_tychus.description: ❢ Quest: Hero Takedowns permanently increase your Attack Speed by 1%, stacking up to 15 times.. ❢ Reward: Upon reaching 15 Stacks, your attack speed is increased by an additional 10%.

Quarterback_tychus.name: Quarterback
Quarterback_tychus.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

ConcussionGrenade_tychus.name: Concussion Grenade
ConcussionGrenade_tychus.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback by 100%.

RelentlessSoldier_tychus.name: Relentless Soldier
RelentlessSoldier_tychus.description: Passive: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

CommandeerOdin_tychus.name: Commandeer Odin
CommandeerOdin_tychus.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

DrakkenLaserDrill_tychus.name: Drakken Laser Drill
DrakkenLaserDrill_tychus.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Active: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

ThatstheStuff_tychus.name: That's the Stuff!
ThatstheStuff_tychus.description: Minigun heals you for 100% of the bonus damage it deals to Heroes.

NeosteelCoating_tychus.name: Neosteel Coating
NeosteelCoating_tychus.description: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

TitanGrenade_tychus.name: Titan Grenade
TitanGrenade_tychus.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

LeadRain_tychus.name: Lead Rain
LeadRain_tychus.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 20%.

ArmorPiercingRounds_tychus.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
ArmorPiercingRounds_tychus.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

BigRedButton_tychus.name: Big Red Button
BigRedButton_tychus.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile.

FocusingDiodes_tychus.name: Focusing Diodes
FocusingDiodes_tychus.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increased damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

SizzlinAttacks_tychus.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
SizzlinAttacks_tychus.description: Passive: Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigum.

BobandWeave_tychus.name: Bob and Weave
BobandWeave_tychus.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

Vigor_valeera.name: Vigor
Vigor_valeera.description: ❢ Quest: Valeera regenerates an additional 2 Energy per second.. ❢ Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

Subtlety_valeera.name: Subtlety
Subtlety_valeera.description: After remaining Vanished for at least 4 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote causes Veleera to regenerate an additional 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

CombatReadiness_valeera.name: Combat Readiness
CombatReadiness_valeera.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 3 charges.
