CripplingPoison_valeera.name: Crippling Poison
CripplingPoison_valeera.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds. Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

Activating Crippling Poison does not break Vanish.

RelentlessStrikes_valeera.name: Relentless Strikes
RelentlessStrikes_valeera.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 10.

Hemorrhage_valeera.name: Hemorrhage
Hemorrhage_valeera.description: Valeer's Basic Attacks deal 25% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

Initiative_valeera.name: Initiative
Initiative_valeera.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 2 Combo Points.

WoundPoison_valeera.name: Wound Poison
WoundPoison_valeera.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds. Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to also reduce healing received by the victim by 50% for 4 seconds.

Activating Wound Poison does not break Vanish.

Mutilate_valeera.name: Mutilate
Mutilate_valeera.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 100% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

FatalFinesse_valeera.name: Fatal Finesse
FatalFinesse_valeera.description: ❢ Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 3, up to 60.. ❢ Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

SliceandDice_valeera.name: Slice and Dice
SliceandDice_valeera.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes Valeera's next 3 Basic Attacks to have their Attack Speed increased by 150%.. Lasts 3 seconds.

Assassinate_valeera.name: Assassinate
Assassinate_valeera.description: Ambush deals 100% additional damage if no other enemy Heroes are within 5 range of the victim.

SmokeBomb_valeera.name: Smoke Bomb
SmokeBomb_valeera.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds. Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unreavealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.
Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

CloakofShadows_valeera.name: Cloak of Shadows
CloakofShadows_valeera.description:
Cooldown: 25 seconds. Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1 second, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.
Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

Elusiveness_valeera.name: Elusiveness
Elusiveness_valeera.description: Increase Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 10%.

DeathFromAbove_valeera.name: Death From Above
DeathFromAbove_valeera.description: Ambush now has 5 range and teleports Valeera behind the victim.

Blind_valeera.name: Blind
Blind_valeera.description: When Cheap Shot expires, the victim is blinded for 2.5 seconds.

Strangle_valeera.name: Strangle
Strangle_valeera.description: Garrote reduces Ability Damage dealt by the victim by 25% for 7 seconds.

SealFate_valeera.name: Seal Fate
SealFate_valeera.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against silenced, rooted, or stunned enemy Heroes.

Rupture_valeera.name: Rupture
Rupture_valeera.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the damage over time effect of Garrote.

ExposeArmor_valeera.name: Expose Armor
ExposeArmor_valeera.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes them to lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

ThistleTea_valeera.name: Thistle Tea
ThistleTea_valeera.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds. Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.
Activating Thistle Tea does not break Vanish.

AdrenalineRush_valeera.name: Adrenaline Rush
AdrenalineRush_valeera.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 30 Energy per second.

EnvelopingShadows_valeera.name: Enveloping Shadows
EnvelopingShadows_valeera.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

Nightslayer_valeera.name: Nightslayer
Nightslayer_valeera.description: Reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 3 seconds.

ColdBlood_valeera.name: Cold Blood
ColdBlood_valeera.description:
Cooldown: 45 seconds. Activate to increase the damage of Valeera's next Evicerate by 100%.
Activating Cold Blood does not break Vanish.

MonsterHunter_valla.name: Monster Hunter
MonsterHunter_valla.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

Caltrops_valla.name: Caltrops
Caltrops_valla.description:
Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 99 (47 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 20% for 1 second.. ❢ Quest: Spend 180 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.
❢ Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

HotPursuit_valla.name: Hot Pursuit
HotPursuit_valla.description: Passive: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and you gain 4 Mana per second.

PuncturingArrow_valla.name: Puncturing Arrow
PuncturingArrow_valla.description: ❢ Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.. ❢ Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

Punishment_valla.name: Punishment
Punishment_valla.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

CreedoftheHunter_valla.name: Creed of the Hunter
CreedoftheHunter_valla.description:
Passive: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.. ❢ Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.
❢ Reward: Your Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

Arsenal_valla.name: Arsenal
Arsenal_valla.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades, which deal 263 (125 + 4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

DeathDealer_valla.name: Death Dealer
DeathDealer_valla.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

RepeatingArrow_valla.name: Repeating Arrow
RepeatingArrow_valla.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

Strafe_valla.name: Strafe
Strafe_valla.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 132 (63 + 4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

RainofVengeance_valla.name: Rain of Vengeance
RainofVengeance_valla.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 493 (234 + 4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

SiphoningArrow_valla.name: Siphoning Arrow
SiphoningArrow_valla.description: You heal for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

TemperedbyDiscipline_valla.name: Tempered by Discipline
TemperedbyDiscipline_valla.description: Passive: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, your Basic Attacks heal you for 25% of the damage dealt.

Gloom_valla.name: Gloom
Gloom_valla.description:
Cooldown: 5 seconds. Active: Activate to consume all Hatred, gaining 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.
Passive: Permenantly gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

FrostShot_valla.name: Frost Shot
FrostShot_valla.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

SeethingHatred_valla.name: Seething Hatred
SeethingHatred_valla.description: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

Manticore_valla.name: Manticore
Manticore_valla.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

Vengeance_valla.name: Vengeance
Vengeance_valla.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 75 (36 + 4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage you deal with Strafe is returned as Health.

StormofVengeance_valla.name: Storm of Vengeance
StormofVengeance_valla.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

Rancor_valla.name: Rancor
Rancor_valla.description: Passive: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

FarflightQuiver_valla.name: Farflight Quiver
FarflightQuiver_valla.description: Passive: Increases your Basic Attack range by 40%.

LionsMaw_varian.name: Lion's Maw
LionsMaw_varian.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120. ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

Overpower_varian.name: Overpower
Overpower_varian.description: When you Parry a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed. Can only occur once per cast.

HighKingsQuest_varian.name: High King's Quest
HighKingsQuest_varian.description:
❢ Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks.. ❢ Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns
❢ Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes
❢ Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

ShieldWall_varian.name: Shield Wall
ShieldWall_varian.description: Parry now grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage for the duration.

Warbringer_varian.name: Warbringer
Warbringer_varian.description: Charge now stuns the target for 1 second instead of slowing them, and its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

LivebytheSword_varian.name: Live by the Sword
LivebytheSword_varian.description: Increase the duration of Parry by 40%. If you block at least 2 Hero Basic Attacks with a single Parry, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

SecondWind_varian.name: Second Wind
SecondWind_varian.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1.17% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

VictoryRush_varian.name: Victory Rush
VictoryRush_varian.description: Every 60 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 877 (416 + 4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy minion dies, the cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

Taunt_varian.name: Taunt
Taunt_varian.description:
Cooldown: 16 seconds. Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.
Passive: Maximum Health increased by 60%.

ColossusSmash_varian.name: Colossus Smash
ColossusSmash_varian.description:
Cooldown: 20 seconds. Smash a target enemy, dealing 410 (195 + 4% per level) damage and making them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 75%.
Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

TwinBladesofFury_varian.name: Twin Blades of Fury
TwinBladesofFury_varian.description:
Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%.
Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.

BannerofStormwind_varian.name: Banner of Stormwind
BannerofStormwind_varian.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

BannerofIronforge_varian.name: Banner of Ironforge
BannerofIronforge_varian.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Activate to place a Banner that grants 25 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 25%. Lasts 12 seconds.

BannerofDalaran_varian.name: Banner of Dalaran
BannerofDalaran_varian.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Ability Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

Juggernaut_varian.name: Juggernaut
Juggernaut_varian.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 6% of their maximum Health.

MortalStrike_varian.name: Mortal Strike
MortalStrike_varian.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

ShatteringThrow_varian.name: Shattering Throw
ShatteringThrow_varian.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Activate to throw a sword that deals 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage to the target, and up to 3068 (1456 + 4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.Passive: Basic Attacks deal up to 200% bonus damage to Shields.

Vigilance_varian.name: Vigilance
Vigilance_varian.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 second.

MasteratArms_varian.name: Master at Arms
MasteratArms_varian.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

Frenzy_varian.name: Frenzy
Frenzy_varian.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

GlorytotheAlliance_varian.name: Glory to the Alliance
GlorytotheAlliance_varian.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

DemoralizingShout_varian.name: Demoralizing Shout
DemoralizingShout_varian.description: Cooldown: 25 seconds. Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 25% for 5 seconds.

GreaterCleave_zeratul.name: Greater Cleave
GreaterCleave_zeratul.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

VorpalBlade_zeratul.name: Vorpal Blade
VorpalBlade_zeratul.description: Cooldown: 15 seconds. Active: Activate to teleport to the last non-structure target you attacked within 3 seconds.

ShadowHunter_zeratul.name: Shadow Hunter
ShadowHunter_zeratul.description: ❢ Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 2 .. ❢ Reward: Upon gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

GrimTask_zeratul.name: Grim Task
GrimTask_zeratul.description:
Passive:. ❢ Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Ability Power by 5% up to 50% . This bonus Ability Power is lost on death.
❢ Reward: None

RendingCleave_zeratul.name: Rending Cleave
RendingCleave_zeratul.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

ComboSlash_zeratul.name: Combo Slash
ComboSlash_zeratul.description: Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

Wormhole_zeratul.name: Wormhole
Wormhole_zeratul.description: For 2 seconds, you can activate Blink again to return to the point where it was cast from.

SlipintoShadow_zeratul.name: Slip into Shadow
SlipintoShadow_zeratul.description: Blink gains an additional charge, but its cooldown is increased by 8 seconds.

SeekerintheDark_zeratul.name: Seeker in the Dark
SeekerintheDark_zeratul.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

ShadowAssault_zeratul.name: Shadow Assault
ShadowAssault_zeratul.description: Your Basic Attacks cause you to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 6 seconds.

VoidPrison_zeratul.name: Void Prison
VoidPrison_zeratul.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

ShroudofAdun_zeratul.name: Shroud of Adun
ShroudofAdun_zeratul.description: Passive: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

SpellShield_zeratul.name: Spell Shield
SpellShield_zeratul.description: Active: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering.

MendingStrikes_zeratul.name: Mending Strikes
MendingStrikes_zeratul.description: Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

MasterWarpBlade_zeratul.name: Master Warp-Blade
MasterWarpBlade_zeratul.description: Passive: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

VoidSlash_zeratul.name: Void Slash
VoidSlash_zeratul.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

SentencedtoDeath_zeratul.name: Sentenced to Death
SentencedtoDeath_zeratul.description: Deal 50% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

NerazimFury_zeratul.name: Nerazim Fury
NerazimFury_zeratul.description: Shadow Assault grants 30% Life Steal, and the duration is increased by 50%.

ProtectivePrison_zeratul.name: Protective Prison
ProtectivePrison_zeratul.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

NexusBlades_zeratul.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_zeratul.description: Passive: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

Rewind_zeratul.name: Rewind
Rewind_zeratul.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Boneslicer_zuljin.name: Boneslicer
Boneslicer_zuljin.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through enemies. Bonus damage increased by 15%.

ArcaniteAxes_zuljin.name: Arcanite Axes
ArcaniteAxes_zuljin.description: Twin Cleave cooldown reduced by 0.5 seconds for every Hero hit. Ability Power is increased by 25% while below 50% Health.

YouWantAxe_zuljin.name: You Want Axe?
YouWantAxe_zuljin.description: ❢ Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks used against Heroes increases your Basic Attack damage by 1.5.. ❢ Reward: Upon reaching 24 Stacks, permanently gain 20% Range.

LettheKillingBegin_zuljin.name: Let the Killing Begin
LettheKillingBegin_zuljin.description: Enemies killed by you increase your attack speed by 6% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.. Hero Takedowns instantly grant 30% Attack Speed.

Headhunter_zuljin.name: Headhunter
Headhunter_zuljin.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds. ❢ Quest: Kill all unique enemy Heroes.
❢ Reward: Activate to reveal all enemy Heroes for 4 seconds.

ViciousAssault_zuljin.name: Vicious Assault
ViciousAssault_zuljin.description: Increases the number of charges to 6. Basic Attacks against afflicted Heroes reduces cooldown by 2 seconds.

WrongPlaceWrongTime_zuljin.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
WrongPlaceWrongTime_zuljin.description: If an enemy is hit by both axes at the same time, deal bonus damage.

Recklessness_zuljin.name: Recklessness
Recklessness_zuljin.description: While below 50% health, gain 25% bonus Attack Damage.

Tazdingo_zuljin.name: Taz'dingo!
Tazdingo_zuljin.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds. Cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health for the next 4 seconds.

Guillotine_zuljin.name: Guillotine
Guillotine_zuljin.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Throw a massive axe into the air that crashes down on enemies, dealing damage based on how much Health you are missing.

EyeofZuljin_zuljin.name: Eye of Zul'jin
EyeofZuljin_zuljin.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Grievous Throw increases Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

ForestMedicine_zuljin.name: Forest Medicine
ForestMedicine_zuljin.description: Regeneration no longer has to be channeled. Damage still breaks the heal.

VoodooShuffle_zuljin.name: Voodoo Shuffle
VoodooShuffle_zuljin.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Activate to remove all Slow and Root effects.

SwirlingDeath_zuljin.name: Swirling Death
SwirlingDeath_zuljin.description: Axes cycle twice and can hit enemies on each revolution but cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

Lacerate_zuljin.name: Lacerate
Lacerate_zuljin.description: Increases Slow amount of each axe by 15%.

Ferocity_zuljin.name: Ferocity
Ferocity_zuljin.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

AmaniResilience_zuljin.name: Amani Resilience
AmaniResilience_zuljin.description: Restore Health equal to 50% of the damage you dealt while using Taz'dingo.

Buzzsaw_zuljin.name: Buzzsaw
Buzzsaw_zuljin.description: After impact, the Guillotine continues rapidly forward, dealing damage to enemies in the line.

Ensnare_zuljin.name: Ensnare
Ensnare_zuljin.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Throw a net forward, rooting the first enemy hit.

PressurizedGlands_abathur.name: Pressurized Glands
PressurizedGlands_abathur.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

SurvivalInstincts_abathur.name: Survival Instincts
SurvivalInstincts_abathur.description: Passive: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

RegenerativeMicrobes_abathur.name: Regenerative Microbes
RegenerativeMicrobes_abathur.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 149 (71 + 4% per level) Health per second over 4 seconds.

EnvenomedNest_abathur.name: Envenomed Nest
EnvenomedNest_abathur.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

ProlificDispersal_abathur.name: Prolific Dispersal
ProlificDispersal_abathur.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

Ballistospores_abathur.name: Ballistospores
Ballistospores_abathur.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

SustainedCarapace_abathur.name: Sustained Carapace
SustainedCarapace_abathur.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

AdrenalOverload_abathur.name: Adrenal Overload
AdrenalOverload_abathur.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

Needlespine_abathur.name: Needlespine
Needlespine_abathur.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

VileNest_abathur.name: Vile Nest
VileNest_abathur.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

NetworkedCarapace_abathur.name: Networked Carapace
NetworkedCarapace_abathur.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

CalldownMULE_abathur.name: Calldown: MULE
CalldownMULE_abathur.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Active: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every 3 seconds.

UltimateEvolution_abathur.name: Ultimate Evolution
UltimateEvolution_abathur.description: Heroic. Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

EvolveMonstrosity_abathur.name: Evolve Monstrosity
EvolveMonstrosity_abathur.description: Heroic. Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from Minions and Structures.Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.

AssaultStrain_abathur.name: Assault Strain
AssaultStrain_abathur.description: Passive: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 224 (107 + 4% per level) damage.

BombardStrain_abathur.name: Bombard Strain
BombardStrain_abathur.description: Passive: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

SpatialEfficiency_abathur.name: Spatial Efficiency
SpatialEfficiency_abathur.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

SomaTransference_abathur.name: Soma Transference
SomaTransference_abathur.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 141 (67 + 4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

EnvenomedSpikes_abathur.name: Envenomed Spikes
EnvenomedSpikes_abathur.description: Your Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

AdrenalineBoost_abathur.name: Adrenaline Boost
AdrenalineBoost_abathur.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

LocustBrood_abathur.name: Locust Brood
LocustBrood_abathur.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Active: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

VolatileMutation_abathur.name: Volatile Mutation
VolatileMutation_abathur.description: Heroic. Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 301 (143 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

EvolutionaryLink_abathur.name: Evolutionary Link
EvolutionaryLink_abathur.description: Heroic. As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

EvolutionComplete_abathur.name: Evolution Complete
EvolutionComplete_abathur.description: Heroic. Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

Hivemind_abathur.name: Hivemind
Hivemind_abathur.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero. This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half the damage and shielding.

LocustNest_abathur.name: Locust Nest
LocustNest_abathur.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Active: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

TasteforBlood_azmodan.name: Taste for Blood
TasteforBlood_azmodan.description: ❢ Quest: Enemies that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation increase its damage by 2, up to 500.. ❢ Reward: None

SiegingWrath_azmodan.name: Sieging Wrath
SiegingWrath_azmodan.description: ❢ Quest: Every time Globe of Annihilation hits an Hero, its damage is increased by 4 up to 100.. ❢ Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

MasterofDestruction_azmodan.name: Master of Destruction
MasterofDestruction_azmodan.description: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Every 1.5 seconds spent channeling increases the range by 10% up to a maximum of 30%.

Gluttony_azmodan.name: Gluttony
Gluttony_azmodan.description: All Shall Burn heals you for 25% of the damage dealt.

ArmyofHell_azmodan.name: Army of Hell
ArmyofHell_azmodan.description: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

HellishHirelings_azmodan.name: Hellish Hirelings
HellishHirelings_azmodan.description: The damage bonus from General of Hell is doubled on Mercenaries.

SinsGrasp_azmodan.name: Sin's Grasp
SinsGrasp_azmodan.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds. Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 543 (258 + 4% per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn. 120 Second Cooldown.

InfernalGlobe_azmodan.name: Infernal Globe
InfernalGlobe_azmodan.description: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

BoundMinion_azmodan.name: Bound Minion
BoundMinion_azmodan.description: Using General of Hell on a Minion grants them 75 Armor against non-Heroic sources, decreasing damage they take from them by 75% and increases the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

GluttonousWard_azmodan.name: Gluttonous Ward
GluttonousWard_azmodan.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3% of your maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

MarchofSin_azmodan.name: March of Sin
MarchofSin_azmodan.description: Increases Azmodan's movement speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

DemonicInvasion_azmodan.name: Demonic Invasion
DemonicInvasion_azmodan.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds. Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 121 (58 + 4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 60 (29 + 4% per level) damage and have 800 (380 + 4% per level) health. Damage is doubled versus non-Heroic targets.

BlackPool_azmodan.name: Black Pool
BlackPool_azmodan.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. 20 second Cooldown per charge, max 2 charges.

HellforgedArmor_azmodan.name: Hellforged Armor

ExplosiveAttacks_thelostvikings.description: Increases Baleog’s splash damage against non-Heroic enemies to 100%.

VikingBribery_thelostvikings.name: Viking Bribery
VikingBribery_thelostvikings.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near your Hero grant you stacks of Viking Bribery. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 100.Current number of Viking Bribery stacks:

PainDontHurt_thelostvikings.name: Pain Don't Hurt
PainDontHurt_thelostvikings.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

EriktheSwift_thelostvikings.name: Erik the Swift
EriktheSwift_thelostvikings.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 Health per second.

ItsaSabotage_thelostvikings.name: It's a Sabotage!
ItsaSabotage_thelostvikings.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures destroy 5 Ammo and deal 135 damage over 10 seconds.

MercenaryLord_thelostvikings.name: Mercenary Lord
MercenaryLord_thelostvikings.description: Non-Boss Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

BaleogtheFierce_thelostvikings.name: Baleog the Fierce
BaleogtheFierce_thelostvikings.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

SpinToWin_thelostvikings.name: Spin To Win!
SpinToWin_thelostvikings.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 damage to nearby enemies.

NorseForce_thelostvikings.name: Norse Force
NorseForce_thelostvikings.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. All Vikings gain a 240 (50 + 10 per level) to 480 (100 + 20 per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

LongboatRaid_thelostvikings.name: Longboat Raid!
LongboatRaid_thelostvikings.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

PlayAgain_thelostvikings.name: Play Again!
PlayAgain_thelostvikings.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

HunkaBurningOlaf_thelostvikings.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
HunkaBurningOlaf_thelostvikings.description: Olaf deals 34 damage every second to nearby enemies.

Jump_thelostvikings.name: Jump!
Jump_thelostvikings.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

NordicAttackSquad_thelostvikings.name: Nordic Attack Squad
NordicAttackSquad_thelostvikings.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

LargeandInCharge_thelostvikings.name: Large and In Charge
LargeandInCharge_thelostvikings.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

ImpatienceIsaVirtue_thelostvikings.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
ImpatienceIsaVirtue_thelostvikings.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

64KBMarathon_thelostvikings.name: 64 KB Marathon
64KBMarathon_thelostvikings.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

Executioner_thelostvikings.name: Executioner
Executioner_thelostvikings.description: Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

RagnaroknRoll_thelostvikings.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
RagnaroknRoll_thelostvikings.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

CheckpointReached_thelostvikings.name: Checkpoint Reached
CheckpointReached_thelostvikings.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

TheSequel_thelostvikings.name: The Sequel!
TheSequel_thelostvikings.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

FuryoftheStorm_thelostvikings.name: Fury of the Storm
FuryoftheStorm_thelostvikings.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 damage to the target, and 105 damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

Backlash_xul.name: Backlash
Backlash_xul.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health.

Shackler_xul.name: Shackler
Shackler_xul.description: While Bone Armor is active, you slow nearby enemies by 35% for 1 Second.

Shade_xul.name: Shade
Shade_xul.description: While Bone Armor is active, you evade all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

Jailors_xul.name: Jailors
Jailors_xul.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors that fixate on the emeny for 15 seconds. These do not count towards your Raise Skeleton maximum.

TragOulsEssence_xul.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
TragOulsEssence_xul.description: Gain 8 Mana when you raise a Skeletal Warrior.

HarvestVitality_xul.name: Harvest Vitality
HarvestVitality_xul.description: Cursed Strikes heals you for 145 (69 + 4% per level) for each Hero hit.

Weaken_xul.name: Weaken
Weaken_xul.description: Increases Cursed Strikes Attack Speed slow from 50% to 75%.

RathmasBlessing_xul.name: Rathma's Blessing
RathmasBlessing_xul.description: Raising a Skeletal Warrior heals you for 55 (55 + 4% per level).

PoisonNova_xul.name: Poison Nova
PoisonNova_xul.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 1249 (593 + 4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

SkeletalMages_xul.name: Skeletal Mages
SkeletalMages_xul.description: Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 103 (49 + 4% per level) damage a second and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

Decrepify_xul.name: Decrepify
Decrepify_xul.description: Spectral Scythe slows enemies by 40% for 3 seconds.

GiantsCurse_xul.name: Giant's Curse
GiantsCurse_xul.description: Cursed Stike deals an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.

CorpseExplosion_xul.name: Corpse Explosion
CorpseExplosion_xul.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 116 (55 + 4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

Executioner_xul.name: Executioner
Executioner_xul.description: Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

FlowingWounds_xul.name: Flowing Wounds
FlowingWounds_xul.description: Reduces Spectral Scythe's cooldown by 5 seconds if you hit an enemy Hero.

AmplifyDamage_xul.name: Amplify Damage
AmplifyDamage_xul.description: Enemies rooted by Bone Prision become Vunerable for 1.75 seconds, taking 25% increased damage.

SkeletonMastery_xul.name: Skeleton Mastery
SkeletonMastery_xul.description: Increases the maximum Skeletal Warriors you can have to 6 and increases their damage by 50%.

CalloftheGrave_xul.name: Call of the Grave
CalloftheGrave_xul.description: Poison Nova deals an additional 1% of the target's maximum life as damage every second.

RaisedMage_xul.name: Raised Mage
RaisedMage_xul.description: When a nearby enemy Hero dies, a Frost Mage appears from their corpse to fight for you. Also increases thge slow of Frost Mages from 30% to 50%.

MortalWound_xul.name: Mortal Wound
MortalWound_xul.description: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

BoneSpear_xul.name: Bone Spear
BoneSpear_xul.description: Cooldown: 10 seconds. Deal 510 (230 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

VolatileAcid_zagara.name: Volatile Acid
VolatileAcid_zagara.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures is increased by 50%.

CorpseFeeders_zagara.name: Corpse Feeders
CorpseFeeders_zagara.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 40% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

Infest_zagara.name: Infest
Infest_zagara.description: Cooldown: 0.5 seconds. Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 200% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

EnvenomedSpines_zagara.name: Envenomed Spines
EnvenomedSpines_zagara.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 504 (240 + 4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

MedusaBlades_zagara.name: Medusa Blades
MedusaBlades_zagara.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

SerratedSpines_zagara.name: Serrated Spines
SerratedSpines_zagara.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

BanelingMassacre_zagara.name: Baneling Massacre
BanelingMassacre_zagara.description: Zagara gains 2 additional charges of Banelings.

ViscousAcid_zagara.name: Viscous Acid
ViscousAcid_zagara.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

BileDrop_zagara.name: Bile Drop
BileDrop_zagara.description: Quest: Increases the impact damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases the bonus damage by another 10%. Reward: Upon reaching 10% bonus damage, increases the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.

DevouringMaw_zagara.name: Devouring Maw
DevouringMaw_zagara.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 176 (84 + 3% per level) damage per second.Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

NydusNetwork_zagara.name: Nydus Network
NydusNetwork_zagara.description: Passive: Creep spreads 25% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack educes all of Zagara's cooldowns by 1 second. Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision of. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-cliking near it. While insde a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second.

HydraliskTransfusion_zagara.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
HydraliskTransfusion_zagara.description: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks.

ProtectiveCoating_zagara.name: Protective Coating
ProtectiveCoating_zagara.description: While on Creep, Zagara takes 20% less damage.

SpellShield_zagara.name: Spell Shield
SpellShield_zagara.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

BroodExpansion_zagara.name: Brood Expansion
BroodExpansion_zagara.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 6 seconds.

CorrosiveSaliva_zagara.name: Corrosive Saliva
CorrosiveSaliva_zagara.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

Mutalisk_zagara.name: Mutalisk
Mutalisk_zagara.description: Your Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and do not have a timed life.

TyrantMaw_zagara.name: Tyrant Maw
TyrantMaw_zagara.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and when you get a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

EndlessCreep_zagara.name: Endless Creep
EndlessCreep_zagara.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 20% Movement Speed.

FuryoftheStorm_zagara.name: Fury of the Storm
FuryoftheStorm_zagara.description: Every 5 seconds, your next basic attack will deal an additional 91 damage to the target, and 228 damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.

SwiftSweep_auriel.name: Swift Sweep
SwiftSweep_auriel.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

IncreasingClarity_auriel.name: Increasing Clarity
IncreasingClarity_auriel.description: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 3 up to 60. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, the center damage bonus is doubled to 120.

RighteousAssault_auriel.name: Righteous Assault
RighteousAssault_auriel.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 2 seconds for each enemy Hero hit, up to a total of 4 seconds.

SearingLight_auriel.name: Searing Light
SearingLight_auriel.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

HeavyBurden_auriel.name: Heavy Burden
HeavyBurden_auriel.description: The enemy will be slowed by 35% for 3 seconds if Detainment Strike stuns the enemy.

RepeatedOffense_auriel.name: Repeated Offense
RepeatedOffense_auriel.description: Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10 up to 100.Reward: After stunning 10 Heroes, increase the damage by an additional 100.

BurstingLight_auriel.name: Bursting Light
BurstingLight_auriel.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ray of Heaven by 2 seconds.

GlimmerofHope_auriel.name: Glimmer of Hope
GlimmerofHope_auriel.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of your next Ray of Heaven by 35%.

EnergizedCord_auriel.name: Energized Cord
EnergizedCord_auriel.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 30% of the damage against non-Heroes.Does not affect your Bestow Hope ally.

EmpathicLink_auriel.name: Empathic Link
EmpathicLink_auriel.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

Resurrect_auriel.name: Resurrect
Resurrect_auriel.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 3 seconds, bringing them back to life with 50% of their maximum health at the location where they died.

CrystalAegis_auriel.name: Crystal Aegis
CrystalAegis_auriel.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 592 (281 + 4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

BlindingFlash_auriel.name: Blinding Flash
BlindingFlash_auriel.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 4 seconds.

ConvergingForce_auriel.name: Converging Force
ConvergingForce_auriel.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

PiercingLash_auriel.name: Piercing Lash
PiercingLash_auriel.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemies in a line.

RepellingStrike_auriel.name: Repelling Strike
RepellingStrike_auriel.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 35% farther.

ReservoirofHope_auriel.name: Reservoir of Hope
ReservoirofHope_auriel.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

WillofHeaven_auriel.name: Will of Heaven
WillofHeaven_auriel.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

WrathofHeaven_auriel.name: Wrath of Heaven
WrathofHeaven_auriel.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Ability Power.

LightSpeed_auriel.name: Light Speed
LightSpeed_auriel.description: Increases the healing of Resurrect to 100% of the ally's maximum Health, and they also gain 199.68% increased Movement Speed that decays over 4 seconds.

DiamondResolve_auriel.name: Diamond Resolve
DiamondResolve_auriel.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants a shield that reduces damage taken by 50% for 4 seconds.

AngelicFlight_auriel.name: Angelic Flight
AngelicFlight_auriel.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Activate to fly to a chosen location.

ShieldofHope_auriel.name: Shield of Hope
ShieldofHope_auriel.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

DreamShot_brightwing.name: Dream Shot
DreamShot_brightwing.description: Reduces the cooldown of Arcane Flare by 1 second for each enemy Hero hit by the outer radius, and 3 seconds for each hit by the inner radius.

HyperShift_brightwing.name: Hyper Shift
HyperShift_brightwing.description: Each allied Hero healed by Soothing Mist reduces the cooldown of Phase Shift by 2 seconds.

Bribe_brightwing.name: Bribe
Bribe_brightwing.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near your Hero grant you stacks of Bribe.  Use 20 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum stacks available: 50.Current number of Bribe stacks: 1

ArcaneBarrage_brightwing.name: Arcane Barrage
ArcaneBarrage_brightwing.description: Increases the range of Arcane Flare by 50%.

UnstableAnomaly_brightwing.name: Unstable Anomaly
UnstableAnomaly_brightwing.description: When Polymorph ends, deal 250 (119 + 4% per level) damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

ManicPixie_brightwing.name: Manic Pixie
ManicPixie_brightwing.description: When Soothing Mist heals an ally with Pixie Dust on them, they heal for an additional 228 (119 + 4% per level) over 4 seconds.

Peekaboo_brightwing.name: Peekaboo!
Peekaboo_brightwing.description: Phase Shifting to an ally reveals a large area around them and all enemies in it for 6 seconds.

Mistified_brightwing.name: Mistified
Mistified_brightwing.description: Reduces the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 0.5 second every time you cast a Basic Ability.

PhaseShield_brightwing.name: Phase Shield
PhaseShield_brightwing.description: After finishing the teleport, the target of your Phase Shift gains a 877 (416 + 4% per level) point Shield for 20 seconds.

Cleanse_brightwing.name: Cleanse
Cleanse_brightwing.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

BlinkHeal_brightwing.name: Blink Heal
BlinkHeal_brightwing.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 447 (213 + 4% per level).  Can store 2 charges.

EmeraldWind_brightwing.name: Emerald Wind
EmeraldWind_brightwing.description: reate an expanding nova of wind, dealing 699 (332 + 4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away. Also passively increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

StickyFlare_brightwing.name: Sticky Flare
StickyFlare_brightwing.description: Targets are slowed by 40% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

PixieBoost_brightwing.name: Pixie Boost
PixieBoost_brightwing.description: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 1.5 seconds.

ShieldDust_brightwing.name: Shield Dust
ShieldDust_brightwing.description: Pixie Dust reduces Ability damage taken by 40%.

IceBlock_brightwing.name: Ice Block
IceBlock_brightwing.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

GreaterPolymorph_brightwing.name: Greater Polymorph
GreaterPolymorph_brightwing.description: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 second.

Critterize_brightwing.name: Critterize
Critterize_brightwing.description: Polymorph makes enemies Vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

BouncyDust_brightwing.name: Bouncy Dust
BouncyDust_brightwing.description: Pixie Dust bounces to another nearby ally upon impact.

HardenedFocus_brightwing.name: Hardened Focus
HardenedFocus_brightwing.description: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

DoubleWyrmhole_brightwing.name: Double Wyrmhole
DoubleWyrmhole_brightwing.description: Blink Heal can be cast a second time on a different target within 2 seconds without consuming a charge.

ContinuousWinds_brightwing.name: Continuous Winds
ContinuousWinds_brightwing.description: Emerald Wind releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage.

RevitalizingMist_brightwing.name: Revitalizing Mist
RevitalizingMist_brightwing.description: Healing another Hero with Soothing Mist increases their healing received from Soothing Mist by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

StormShield_brightwing.name: Storm Shield
StormShield_brightwing.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

Transcendence_kharazim.name: Transcendence
Transcendence_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 160 (76 + 4% per level).

IronFists_kharazim.name: Iron Fists
IronFists_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 125% bonus damage and gives 30% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

Insight_kharazim.name: Insight
Insight_kharazim.description: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 31 (15 + 4% per level) Mana and grants a stack of Insight. Reward: Once you have 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces the cooldown of all your Basic Abilities by 1 second.

SpiritAlly_kharazim.name: Spirit Ally
SpiritAlly_kharazim.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Place a Spirit Ally that heals allies in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 316 (150 + 4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. You can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

EarthAlly_kharazim.name: Earth Ally
EarthAlly_kharazim.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Place an Earth Ally that reduces Heroic Basic Attack damage nearby allied Heroes receive by 50%. Has 843 (400 + 4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

AirAlly_kharazim.name: Air Ally
AirAlly_kharazim.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds. Place an Air Ally that grants vision of a large area around it. Has 158 (75 + 4% per level) Health, lasts 40 seconds, and stores up to 2 charges. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.

BlindingSpeed_kharazim.name: Blinding Speed
BlindingSpeed_kharazim.description: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

HeavenlyZeal_kharazim.name: Heavenly Zeal
HeavenlyZeal_kharazim.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus from 10% to 25%.

BlazingFists_kharazim.name: Blazing Fists
BlazingFists_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

DivinePalm_kharazim.name: Divine Palm
DivinePalm_kharazim.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 2501 (1187 + 4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

SevenSidedStrike_kharazim.name: Seven-Sided Strike
SevenSidedStrike_kharazim.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 1.81 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

Quicksilver_kharazim.name: Quicksilver
Quicksilver_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives you and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

SpellShield_kharazim.name: Spell Shield
SpellShield_kharazim.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds. This can only trigger once every 30 seconds.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering.

SixthSense_kharazim.name: Sixth Sense
SixthSense_kharazim.description: While stunned or rooted, Block all Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 75% for 4 seconds.

CleansingTouch_kharazim.name: Cleansing Touch
CleansingTouch_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

WayoftheHundredFists_kharazim.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
WayoftheHundredFists_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 50% damage each.

EchoofHeaven_kharazim.name: Echo of Heaven
EchoofHeaven_kharazim.description: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

DashofLight_kharazim.name: Dash of Light
DashofLight_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3 seconds.

PeacefulRepose_kharazim.name: Peaceful Repose
PeacefulRepose_kharazim.description: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

StormShield_kharazim.name: Storm Shield
StormShield_kharazim.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

Epiphany_kharazim.name: Epiphany
Epiphany_kharazim.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Activate to restore 32.81% of your maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

ConjurersPursuit_lili.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
ConjurersPursuit_lili.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2.54 per second. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, also increase your maximum Mana by 100.

ProToss_lili.name: Pro Toss
ProToss_lili.description: Increases the range of Healing Brew by 30%.

TimelessCreature_lili.name: Timeless Creature
TimelessCreature_lili.description: Increases the duration of Cloud Serpent by 50%.

HealingWard_lili.name: Healing Ward
HealingWard_lili.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that heals allies in an area for 1.95% of their max Health every second for 10 seconds.

MendingSerpent_lili.name: Mending Serpent
MendingSerpent_lili.description: Cloud Serpent heals the friendly unit for 22 Health each time it attacks.

MassVortex_lili.name: Mass Vortex
MassVortex_lili.description: Increases the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 4.

LingeringBlind_lili.name: Lingering Blind
LingeringBlind_lili.description: Increases the duration of Blinding Wind by 50%.

PitchPerfect_lili.name: Pitch Perfect
PitchPerfect_lili.description: After casting Healing Brew, its cost is reduced by 10 Mana for 6 seconds.  This effect does not stack.

TheGoodStuff_lili.name: The Good Stuff
TheGoodStuff_lili.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 60 Health over 6 seconds.

LightningSerpent_lili.name: Lightning Serpent
LightningSerpent_lili.description: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to 3 nearby enemy targets, dealing 15 damage each.

Cleanse_lili.name: Cleanse
Cleanse_lili.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

Jugof1000Cups_lili.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
Jugof1000Cups_lili.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies, prioritizing Heroes, restoring a total of 1632 Health over 6 seconds.

WaterDragon_lili.name: Water Dragon
WaterDragon_lili.description: Summon a Water Dragon that after a delay hits the nearest enemy Hero and all enemies near them, dealing 318 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

ElusiveFeet_lili.name: Elusive Feet
ElusiveFeet_lili.description: When Fast Feet is triggered, gain 2 charges of Block (75% reduced Basic Attack damage) for 10 seconds. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

HinderingWinds_lili.name: Hindering Winds
HinderingWinds_lili.description: Blinding Wind also slows enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

SurgingWinds_lili.name: Surging Winds
SurgingWinds_lili.description: Gain 5% Ability Power for 8 seconds for every enemy hit by Blinding Wind. Additional enemies hit refresh the duration of this buff and further increase Ability Power. Stacks up to 4 times.

ShrinkRay_lili.name: Shrink Ray
ShrinkRay_lili.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.
