ExtendedSpikes_anubarak.description: Increases the max range of Impale by 25%.

DampenMagic_anubarak.name: Dampen Magic
DampenMagic_anubarak.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Can only trigger once every 8 seconds.

AssaultScarab_anubarak.name: Assault Scarab
AssaultScarab_anubarak.description: Increases the attack damage of spawned Beetles by 30%.

RegenerationMaster_anubarak.name: Regeneration Master
RegenerationMaster_anubarak.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

Underking_anubarak.name: Underking
Underking_anubarak.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

LocustNeedles_anubarak.name: Locust Needles
LocustNeedles_anubarak.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% of your Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

LegionofBeetles_anubarak.name: Legion of Beetles
LegionofBeetles_anubarak.description: Anub'arak automatically spawns Beetles every 8 seconds.  Can be toggled on and off.

ShedExoskeleton_anubarak.name: Shed Exoskeleton
ShedExoskeleton_anubarak.description: Using Harden Carapace also increases Anub'arak's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

ChitinousPlating_anubarak.name: Chitinous Plating
ChitinousPlating_anubarak.description: Increases Harden Carapace's Shield amount by 40%.

LeechingScarabs_anubarak.name: Leeching Scarabs
LeechingScarabs_anubarak.description: Beetles heal you for 50% of their damage with each attack if you are nearby.

LocustSwarm_anubarak.name: Locust Swarm
LocustSwarm_anubarak.description: Deal 145 (69 + 4% per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 40 (19 + 4% per level) Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

Cocoon_anubarak.name: Cocoon
Cocoon_anubarak.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

BurningRage_anubarak.name: Burning Rage
BurningRage_anubarak.description: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies.

UrticatingSpines_anubarak.name: Urticating Spines
UrticatingSpines_anubarak.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

BedofBarbs_anubarak.name: Bed of Barbs
BedofBarbs_anubarak.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemy Move Speed by 30% and deals 101 (48 + 4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

Epicenter_anubarak.name: Epicenter
Epicenter_anubarak.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 85% and lowers the cooldown by 4 seconds for each Hero hit.

BeetleJuiced_anubarak.name: Beetle, Juiced
BeetleJuiced_anubarak.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes sapwns a Beetle.

BloodforBlood_anubarak.name: Blood for Blood
BloodforBlood_anubarak.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

HiveMaster_anubarak.name: Hive Master
HiveMaster_anubarak.description: Anub'arak gains a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 336 (160 + 4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 82 (39 + 4% per level) health.

Cryptweave_anubarak.name: Cryptweave
Cryptweave_anubarak.description: Staying near the Coccon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

HardenedShield_anubarak.name: Hardened Shield
HardenedShield_anubarak.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

Rewind_anubarak.name: Rewind
Rewind_anubarak.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

ReactiveParry_artanis.name: Reactive Parry
ReactiveParry_artanis.description: Activating Twin Blades reduces the damage received from the next Hero Basic Attack by 75%.  Can store up to 2 charges.

AmateurOpponent_artanis.name: Amateur Opponent
AmateurOpponent_artanis.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage versus non-Heroic enemies.

SeasonedMarksman_artanis.name: Seasoned Marksman
SeasonedMarksman_artanis.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

PsionicSynergy_artanis.name: Psionic Synergy
PsionicSynergy_artanis.description: Cooldown Reduction gained by hitting Heroes with Blade Dash is increased to 4 seconds.

ShieldBattery_artanis.name: Shield Battery
ShieldBattery_artanis.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 50% faster while the shield is active, and increases the duration of Shielf Overload from 5 to 6 seconds.

ShieldSurge_artanis.name: Shield Surge
ShieldSurge_artanis.description: Shield Overload's shield amount is increased by 80% while you are below 25% Max Health.

SolariteReaper_artanis.name: Solarite Reaper
SolariteReaper_artanis.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

WarpSickness_artanis.name: Warp Sickness
WarpSickness_artanis.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

ChronoSurge_artanis.name: Chrono Surge
ChronoSurge_artanis.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 50% bonus Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

FollowThrough_artanis.name: Follow Through
FollowThrough_artanis.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

SuppressionPulse_artanis.name: Suppression Pulse
SuppressionPulse_artanis.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 250 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

PurifierBeam_artanis.name: Purifier Beam
PurifierBeam_artanis.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 404 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

TemplarsZeal_artanis.name: Templar's Zeal
TemplarsZeal_artanis.description: Blade Dash cooldown recharges 100% faster while you are below 50% Health.

TripleStrike_artanis.name: Triple Strike
TripleStrike_artanis.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3 but increase its cooldown by 1 second..

GravitonVortex_artanis.name: Graviton Vortex
GravitonVortex_artanis.description: Phase Prism pulls and damages an additional enemy Hero near the first.

PhaseBulwark_artanis.name: Phase Bulwark
PhaseBulwark_artanis.description: When Shield Overload activates, you take 40% less damage from Abilities for 4 seconds.

ZealotCharge_artanis.name: Zealot Charge
ZealotCharge_artanis.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

TitanKiller_artanis.name: Titan Killer
TitanKiller_artanis.description: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

PsionicWound_artanis.name: Psionic Wound
PsionicWound_artanis.description: Twin Blades final strike causes enemy Heroes to become Vulnerable for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

PlasmaBurn_artanis.name: Plasma Burn
PlasmaBurn_artanis.description: While Shield Overload is active, you deal 50 damage a second to nearby enemies.

OrbitalBombardment_artanis.name: Orbital Bombardment
OrbitalBombardment_artanis.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

TargetPurified_artanis.name: Target Purified
TargetPurified_artanis.description: If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest enemy Hero.

ForceofWill_artanis.name: Force of Will
ForceofWill_artanis.description: Increases Shield Overload's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks to 6 seconds.

NexusBlades_artanis.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_artanis.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

Block_arthas.name: Block
Block_arthas.description: Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

EternalHunger_arthas.name: Eternal Hunger
EternalHunger_arthas.description: Quest: Using Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero permanently increases the Mana it restores by 4, up to 40. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Frostmourne Hungers, also increase its damage bonus by 25%.

FrostPresence_arthas.name: Frost Presence
FrostPresence_arthas.description: Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds when it hits an enemy Hero.

FrozenWastes_arthas.name: Frozen Wastes
FrozenWastes_arthas.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second.

Deathlord_arthas.name: Deathlord
Deathlord_arthas.description: Reduce Death Coil's cooldown by 2 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

RuneTap_arthas.name: Rune Tap
RuneTap_arthas.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals you for 4% of your max Health.

ImmortalCoil_arthas.name: Immortal Coil
ImmortalCoil_arthas.description: You gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when you use it on enemies. If you damage an enemy Hero with it, you also heal for an additional 100% of the damage dealt.

IceboundFortitude_arthas.name: Icebound Fortitude
IceboundFortitude_arthas.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 25% and reduce the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs agaisnt you by 75% for 3 seconds.

ArmyoftheDead_arthas.name: Army of the Dead
ArmyoftheDead_arthas.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 586 Health.

SummonSindragosa_arthas.name: Summon Sindragosa
SummonSindragosa_arthas.description: Deals 504 damage and slows enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

TrailofFrost_arthas.name: Trail of Frost
TrailofFrost_arthas.description: Increases Howling Blast's range by 30% and causes it to also root enemies between you and the target for 1.25 seconds.

FrostStrike_arthas.name: Frost Strike
FrostStrike_arthas.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 40% for 1.5 seconds.

FrigidWinds_arthas.name: Frigid Winds
FrigidWinds_arthas.description: Frozen Tempest reduces enemy Attack Speed by -200% per second, stacking up to 40%.

RemorselessWinter_arthas.name: Remorseless Winter
RemorselessWinter_arthas.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are rooted for 1.75 seconds. This effect only happen once every 10 seconds.

FrostmourneFeeds_arthas.name: Frostmourne Feeds
FrostmourneFeeds_arthas.description: Increased application to your next 2 Basic Attacks.

EmbraceDeath_arthas.name: Embrace Death
EmbraceDeath_arthas.description: Death Coil deals 10% more damage for each 10% of life you are missing.

LegionofNorthrend_arthas.name: Legion of Northrend
LegionofNorthrend_arthas.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

AbsoluteZero_arthas.name: Absolute Zero
AbsoluteZero_arthas.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

DeathsAdvance_arthas.name: Death's Advance
DeathsAdvance_arthas.description: Passively increases your Movement Speed by 10%. Activate to increase this bonus to 30% for 3 seconds.

AntiMagicShield_arthas.name: Anti-Magic Shield
AntiMagicShield_arthas.description: Activate to reduce damage taken from Abilities by 100% for 3 seconds, and heal yourself for 25% of the damage prevented.

AccumulatingFire_chen.name: Accumulating Fire
AccumulatingFire_chen.description: Quest: Everytime you set a Hero on fire with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After igniting 30 Heroes, you gain Resistant for 1 second per Hero set on fire, reducing damage taken by 25%.

GroundingBrew_chen.name: Grounding Brew
GroundingBrew_chen.description: Fortifying Brew reduces all incoming Ability Damage by 30% while drinking.

FreshestIngredients_chen.name: Freshest Ingredients
FreshestIngredients_chen.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

ElusiveBrawler_chen.name: Elusive Brawler
ElusiveBrawler_chen.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds. Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Your Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 3 seconds.

DeadlyStrike_chen.name: Deadly Strike
DeadlyStrike_chen.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while you have Shields from Fortifying Brew.

KegToss_chen.name: Keg Toss
KegToss_chen.description: Quest: Everytime Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

RingofFire_chen.name: Ring of Fire
RingofFire_chen.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 114 (55 + 4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

BrewmastersBalance_chen.name: Brewmaster's Balance
BrewmastersBalance_chen.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 40 (19 + 4% per level) Health per second.

BolderFlavor_chen.name: Bolder Flavor
BolderFlavor_chen.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields you for 697 (331 + 4% per level). Additionally, Shields persists for 1 extra second after you stop drinking.

RefreshingElixir_chen.name: Refreshing Elixir
RefreshingElixir_chen.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%, or by 60% while drinking Fortifying Brew.

WanderingKeg_chen.name: Wandering Keg
WanderingKeg_chen.description: Cooldown: 70 seconds. Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 130 (62 + 4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

StormEarthFire_chen.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
StormEarthFire_chen.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds. Split into three elemental spirits for 12.15 seconds, each with 75% of your maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

PressurePoint_chen.name: Pressure Point
PressurePoint_chen.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

ATouchofHoney_chen.name: A Touch of Honey
ATouchofHoney_chen.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

WitheringFlames_chen.name: Withering Flames
WitheringFlames_chen.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Ability Power by 25% for 3 seconds.

AnotherRound_chen.name: Another Round
AnotherRound_chen.description: After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of your next Basic Ability will be reduced by 3 seconds.

EnoughtoShare_chen.name: Enough to Share
EnoughtoShare_chen.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 119 (57 + 4% per level) per second.

UntappedPotential_chen.name: Untapped Potential
UntappedPotential_chen.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 25% and reduces damage taken by 50%.

ElementalConduit_chen.name: Elemental Conduit
ElementalConduit_chen.description: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of your maximum Health and empowers their abilities. Storm can grant your spirits Unstoppable. Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds. Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

PurifyingBrew_chen.name: Purifying Brew
PurifyingBrew_chen.description: Cooldown: 5 seconds. The next Stun or Silence used against you has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

StormstoutSecretRecipe_chen.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
StormstoutSecretRecipe_chen.description: Heal for 1.5% of your maximum Health every time your Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

SurgingDash_cho.name: Surging Dash
SurgingDash_cho.description: Increases Surging Fist range and speed by 25%.

BlazingBulwark_cho.name: Blazing Bulwark
BlazingBulwark_cho.description: Consuming Blaze grants you ??? stack of Block when you hit an enemy Hero, up to 10. Block reduces damage taken from enemy Basic Attacks by 50%.

FuelfortheFlame_cho.name: Fuel for the Flame
FuelfortheFlame_cho.description: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your next Consuming Blaze heal by 50%.

RunedGauntlet_cho.name: Runed Gauntlet
RunedGauntlet_cho.description: Rune Bomb increases your next Basic Attack by 75%.

Rollback_cho.name: Rollback
Rollback_cho.description: Rune Bomb now returns to you, damaging enemies in its path.

SearedFlesh_cho.name: Seared Flesh
SearedFlesh_cho.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.

PowerSurge_cho.name: Power Surge
PowerSurge_cho.description: Reduces the initial delay of Surging Fist by 50% and it is 100% wider.

FireEater_cho.name: Fire Eater
FireEater_cho.description: Basic Attacks against targets inflicted with Consuming Blaze heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

IAMHurrying_cho.name: I AM Hurrying!
IAMHurrying_cho.description: Increases the duration of Gall's "Hurry Up, Oaf!" by 1.5 second and it no longer fades over time.

HammerofTwilight_cho.name: Hammer of Twilight
HammerofTwilight_cho.description: Passively increases Basic Attack damage by 25%. Activate to swing the Hammer to deal 377 (164 + 4.5% per level) damage, push enemies away, and stun for 0.75 seconds.

Upheaval_cho.name: Upheaval
Upheaval_cho.description: After 1 second pull enemies towards your direction, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage.

RunicFeedback_cho.name: Runic Feedback
RunicFeedback_cho.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces your Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit.

SurgeofStamina_cho.name: Surge of Stamina
SurgeofStamina_cho.description: After using Surging Fist, the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs applied to you are reduced by 50% for 5 seconds.

MoltenBlock_cho.name: Molten Block
MoltenBlock_cho.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 202 (96 + 4% per level) damage per second.

TwilightVeil_cho.name: Twilight Veil
TwilightVeil_cho.description: Consuming Blaze reduces damage taken from Abilities by 50% for 2 seconds per enemy Hero hit.

FrenziedFists_cho.name: Frenzied Fists
FrenziedFists_cho.description: If Surging Fist hits an enemy Hero, your Attack Speed is increased by 100% for 4 seconds.

CripplingBlow_cho.name: Crippling Blow
CripplingBlow_cho.description: Enemies hit by Surging Fist are slowed by 90% for 1.25 seconds.

CthunsGift_cho.name: C'thun's Gift
CthunsGift_cho.description: Your Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

FavoroftheOldGods_cho.name: Favor of the Old Gods
FavoroftheOldGods_cho.description: Upheaval grants you Resistant, reducing your damage taken by 50% for 5 seconds.

TheWillOfGall_cho.name: The Will Of Gall
TheWillOfGall_cho.description: Gall can activate Will of Gall to make you Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

EnduringSwarm_dehaka.name: Enduring Swarm
EnduringSwarm_dehaka.description: While active, Dark Swarm reduces damage taken from Spells by 60%.

PrimalAggression_dehaka.name: Primal Aggression
PrimalAggression_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm duration increased by 0.5 seconds and it deals 90% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

EnhancedAgility_dehaka.name: Enhanced Agility
EnhancedAgility_dehaka.description: ❢ Quest: Each time you collect 50 Essence, permanently increase your Movement Speed by 1%, up to 10%.

TissueRegeneration_dehaka.name: Tissue Regeneration
TissueRegeneration_dehaka.description: ❢ Quest: Each time you collect 50 Essence, permanently increase your Health Regeneration by 5, up to 50.

LurkerStrain_dehaka.name: Lurker Strain
LurkerStrain_dehaka.description: Burrow grants Stealth for 3 seconds. Emerging from Burrow knocks nearby enemies back and slows them by 30% for 2 seconds.

OneWhoCollects_dehaka.name: One-Who-Collects
OneWhoCollects_dehaka.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

HeroStalker_dehaka.name: Hero Stalker
HeroStalker_dehaka.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%.

FeedingFrenzy_dehaka.name: Feeding Frenzy
FeedingFrenzy_dehaka.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

Symbiosis_dehaka.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis_dehaka.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

EssenceDevourer_dehaka.name: Essence Devourer
EssenceDevourer_dehaka.description: ❢ Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence and increase your maximum Essence by 1, to a maximum of 10 increased Essence.. ❢ Reward: After collecting 10 Regeneration Globes, the amount of Essence you gain from Regeneration Globes is increased to 15.

Isolation_dehaka.name: Isolation
Isolation_dehaka.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage, silencing and slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

Adaptation_dehaka.name: Adaptation
Adaptation_dehaka.description: After 5 seconds, heal for 60% of the damage you took over this period.

SwiftPursuit_dehaka.name: Swift Pursuit
SwiftPursuit_dehaka.description: Brushstalker's Movement Speed duration after leaving a Bush is increased from 1 to 3 seconds.

FerociousStalker_dehaka.name: Ferocious Stalker
FerociousStalker_dehaka.description: After using Brushstalker, increase all damage you deal by 25% for 10 seconds.

PrimalSwarm_dehaka.name: Primal Swarm
PrimalSwarm_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to take 10% extra damage for 0.75 seconds.

ParalyzingEnzymes_dehaka.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
ParalyzingEnzymes_dehaka.description: Drag slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

Contagion_dehaka.name: Contagion
Contagion_dehaka.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

ChangeIsSurvival_dehaka.name: Change Is Survival
ChangeIsSurvival_dehaka.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received.

ApexPredator_dehaka.name: Apex Predator
ApexPredator_dehaka.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 25 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

EssenceClaws_dehaka.name: Essence Claws
EssenceClaws_dehaka.description: Your Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, you gain 5 Essence.

Bulwark_diablo.name: Bulwark
Bulwark_diablo.description: Increase the duration of Shadow Charge’s Resistance effect from 2 to 5 seconds.

DevilsDue_diablo.name: Devil's Due
DevilsDue_diablo.description: Regeneration Globes and Healing Fountains are 2% more effective for every stack of Black Soulstone.

LifeLeech_diablo.name: Life Leech
LifeLeech_diablo.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal you for the same amount.

FromtheShadows_diablo.name: From the Shadows
FromtheShadows_diablo.description: Enemies knocked against unpathable locations are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

SpeedDemon_diablo.name: Speed Demon
SpeedDemon_diablo.description: Diablo gains 30% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after being Stunned or Rooted.

DemonicStrength_diablo.name: Demonic Strength
DemonicStrength_diablo.description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

SoulFeast_diablo.name: Soul Feast
SoulFeast_diablo.description: Each Soulstone stack grants 0.4 Health Regeneration per second.

SoulShield_diablo.name: Soul Shield
SoulShield_diablo.description: Each Black Soulstone stack Diablo has grants him 0.35% Resistance to enemy Abilities.

DiabolicalMomentum_diablo.name: Diabolical Momentum
DiabolicalMomentum_diablo.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shadow Charge and Overpower by 1.5 seconds.

Apocalypse_diablo.name: Apocalypse
Apocalypse_diablo.description: Cooldown: 100 seconds. Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and stunning for 2 seconds.

LightningBreath_diablo.name: Lightning Breath
LightningBreath_diablo.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 damage over 4 seconds. The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

DevastatingCharge_diablo.name: Devastating Charge
DevastatingCharge_diablo.description: Shadow Charging an enemy into unpathable terrain deals an additional 5% of that targets max Health in damage.. ❢ Quest: Every time you charge an enemy into unpathable terrain, increase the bonus damage by 2%, stacking up to a 10% bonus (15% max health possible)

FireDevil_diablo.name: Fire Devil
FireDevil_diablo.description: Fire Stomp increases your Basic Attack damage by 25% and surrounds you in flames that deal 20 damage every second for 6 seconds.

Hellfire_diablo.name: Hellfire
Hellfire_diablo.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp increases the damage of the next Fire Stomp by 10%, stacking up to 100%.

DebilitatingFlames_diablo.name: Debilitating Flames
DebilitatingFlames_diablo.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are slowed by 15% for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

Domination_diablo.name: Domination
Domination_diablo.description: Reduces the cooldown of Overpower by 4 seconds. Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

FearfulPresence_diablo.name: Fearful Presence
FearfulPresence_diablo.description:
Cooldown: 20 seconds. Activate to reduce the damage dealt by nearby enemy Heroes by 30% for 3 seconds.
Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Diablo have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

DyingBreath_diablo.name: Dying Breath
DyingBreath_diablo.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds and is cast for free when you die.

Hellstorm_diablo.name: Hellstorm
Hellstorm_diablo.description: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.

LordofTerror_diablo.name: Lord of Terror
LordofTerror_diablo.description: Cooldown: 60 seconds. Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes.

Hellgate_diablo.name: Hellgate
Hellgate_diablo.description: Cooldown: 90 seconds. Activate to teleport a short distance and place a Demonic Rune at that location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and stuns enemies for 1.75 seconds.

GuitarHero_etc.name: Guitar Hero
GuitarHero_etc.description: While Guitar Solo is active, you heal for 30% of the damage dealt by Basic Attacks. Also increases the Attack Speed bonus of Rockstar by 5%.

ProgRock_etc.name: Prog Rock
ProgRock_etc.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100. Reward: After reaching 100 increased healing, Guitar Solar also helas nearby allied Heroes for 117 (56 + 4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

BlockParty_etc.name: Block Party
BlockParty_etc.description: Rockstar also grants allies a stack of Block, reducing the damage they take from the next Basic Attack by 50% for 8 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

CrowdSurfer_etc.name: Crowd Surfer
CrowdSurfer_etc.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

LoudSpeakers_etc.name: Loud Speakers
LoudSpeakers_etc.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

SpeedMetal_etc.name: Speed Metal

HelpingHand_stitches.name: Helping Hand
HelpingHand_stitches.description: Hook can also pull allied Heroes (but will not damage them). When used to pull allies, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

Pulverize_stitches.name: Pulverize
Pulverize_stitches.description: Decreases Slam's cooldown by 2 seconds and it also slows enemies by 75% for 1 second.

ShishKabob_stitches.name: Shish Kabob
ShishKabob_stitches.description: Hook can pull up to 2 targets.

Stoneskin_stitches.name: Stoneskin
Stoneskin_stitches.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

RegenerativeBile_stitches.name: Regenerative Bile
RegenerativeBile_stitches.description: Putrid Bile lasts 2 seconds longer, grants an additional 10% Movement Speed and heals for 48.65% of the damage dealt.

HungryHungryStitches_stitches.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
HungryHungryStitches_stitches.description: While active, Gorge can be repeatedly recast until the first target is expelled. Increases Gorge damage by 40%.

HardenedShield_stitches.name: Hardened Shield
HardenedShield_stitches.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

BoltoftheStorm_stitches.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm_stitches.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

PurgeEvil_tyrael.name: Purge Evil
PurgeEvil_tyrael.description: Smite deals 30% more damage to Heroes.

ProtectioninDeath_tyrael.name: Protection in Death
ProtectioninDeath_tyrael.description: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 10 seconds.

EvenInDeath_tyrael.name: Even In Death
EvenInDeath_tyrael.description: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

RegenerationMaster_tyrael.name: Regeneration Master
RegenerationMaster_tyrael.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage, to a max of 40 damage.Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

HoradricReforging_tyrael.name: Horadric Reforging
HoradricReforging_tyrael.description: If El'druins Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

SwiftRetribution_tyrael.name: Swift Retribution
SwiftRetribution_tyrael.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

AmplifiedHealing_tyrael.name: Amplified Healing
AmplifiedHealing_tyrael.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

VigorousStrike_tyrael.name: Vigorous Strike
VigorousStrike_tyrael.description: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

AngelsGrace_tyrael.name: Angel's Grace
AngelsGrace_tyrael.description: After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

Reciprocate_tyrael.name: Reciprocate
Reciprocate_tyrael.description: When your shield expires, it explodes for 439 (208 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Zealotry_tyrael.name: Zealotry
Zealotry_tyrael.description: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

SearingAttacks_tyrael.name: Searing Attacks
SearingAttacks_tyrael.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds. Each attack costs 15 Mana.

Judgment_tyrael.name: Judgment
Judgment_tyrael.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage.

Sanctification_tyrael.name: Sanctification
Sanctification_tyrael.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

BurningRage_tyrael.name: Burning Rage
BurningRage_tyrael.description: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies.

AngelicAbsorption_tyrael.name: Angelic Absorption
AngelicAbsorption_tyrael.description: Enemies that attack you while shielded grant 138 Health over 3 seconds.

ImposingWill_tyrael.name: Imposing Will
ImposingWill_tyrael.description: Enemies that attack you while shielded have their Attack Speed and Movement Speed slowed by 50% for 2 seconds.

AngelicMight_tyrael.name: Angelic Might
AngelicMight_tyrael.description: Gain 25% increased damage on your next Basic Attack for each target hit by Smite.

BladeofJustice_tyrael.name: Blade of Justice
BladeofJustice_tyrael.description: After teleporting using El'Druin's Might, increase your Attack Speed by 50% for 5 seconds.

HolyGround_tyrael.name: Holy Ground
HolyGround_tyrael.description: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'Druin's Might.

Salvation_tyrael.name: Salvation
Salvation_tyrael.description: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 35%.

BloodforBlood_tyrael.name: Blood for Blood
BloodforBlood_tyrael.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

AngelofJustice_tyrael.name: Angel of Justice
AngelofJustice_tyrael.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

HolyArena_tyrael.name: Holy Arena
HolyArena_tyrael.description: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

HardenedShield_tyrael.name: Hardened Shield
HardenedShield_tyrael.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

NexusBlades_tyrael.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_tyrael.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

DemolitionsExpert_zarya.name: Demolitions Expert
DemolitionsExpert_zarya.description: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.375 seconds, up to 3 seconds.Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

TogetherWeAreStrong_zarya.name: Together We Are Strong
TogetherWeAreStrong_zarya.description: Every 22 (11 + 4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 25 Energy per shield.

FeeltheHeat_zarya.name: Feel the Heat
FeeltheHeat_zarya.description: Zarya's Basic Attack deals -8.50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

MaximumCharge_zarya.name: Maximum Charge
MaximumCharge_zarya.description: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy.Quest: Spend 120 seconds at or above 50 Energy.Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

IAmtheStrongest_zarya.name: I Am the Strongest
IAmtheStrongest_zarya.description: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 307 (146 + 4% per level) damage.

GiveMeTwenty_zarya.name: Give Me Twenty
GiveMeTwenty_zarya.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently. Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 3 seconds.

SpeedBarrier_zarya.name: Speed Barrier
SpeedBarrier_zarya.description: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 35% for the duration.

DefensiveShielding_zarya.name: Defensive Shielding
DefensiveShielding_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally reduce the damage of the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks within 12 seconds by 75%.

PinpointAccuracy_zarya.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
PinpointAccuracy_zarya.description: Particle Grenade deals 40% more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

ExplosiveBarrier_zarya.name: Explosive Barrier
ExplosiveBarrier_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 220 (104 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

TotheLimit_zarya.name: To the Limit
TotheLimit_zarya.description: While above 50 Energy your Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

HitMe_zarya.name: Hit Me
HitMe_zarya.description: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 20% more Energy.

GravitonSurge_zarya.name: Graviton Surge
GravitonSurge_zarya.description: Cooldown: 120 seconds. Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

ExpulsionZone_zarya.name: Expulsion Zone
ExpulsionZone_zarya.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Launch a gravity bomb that deals 272 (129 + 4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

UnstoppableCompetitor_zarya.name: Unstoppable Competitor
UnstoppableCompetitor_zarya.description: Personal Barrier makes you Unstoppable for up to 1.5 seconds.

SpellBarrier_zarya.name: Spell Barrier
SpellBarrier_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants a Spell Shield that reduces Ability Damage taken by 75% for 3 seconds.

EnduranceTraining_zarya.name: Endurance Training
EnduranceTraining_zarya.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

PainisTemporary_zarya.name: Pain is Temporary
PainisTemporary_zarya.description: Cooldown: 30 seconds. Activate to consume all Energy and gain a shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal shield active on herself at a time.

PlasmaShock_zarya.name: Plasma Shock
PlasmaShock_zarya.description: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 1 second to enemies near the center.

CleansingShield_zarya.name: Cleansing Shield
CleansingShield_zarya.description: Shield Ally removes all disabling effects.

GainTrain_zarya.name: Gain Train
GainTrain_zarya.description: Shield Ally now grants an untalented shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

BorninBattle_zarya.name: Born in Battle
BorninBattle_zarya.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

GravityKills_zarya.name: Gravity Kills
GravityKills_zarya.description: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and causes it to deal 307 (146 + 4% per level) damage over the duration.

ClearOut_zarya.name: Clear Out
ClearOut_zarya.description: Increases Expulsion Zone's radius by 15% and Zarya's maximum Energy temporarily increases by 10 per enemy Hero hit for 10 seconds.

Grenadier_zarya.name: Grenadier
Grenadier_zarya.description: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

UnyieldingDefender_zarya.name: Unyielding Defender
UnyieldingDefender_zarya.description: Cooldown: 45 seconds. Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.
